Severely dampens the power of any spellcaster struck with this weapon.

Targets receive a [1] penalty to spell attack rolls and Spell Save DC, and Disadvantage on Saving Throws for maintaining Concentration for [2] turns.
ALCH_Oil_Wizardsbane_Passive.DescriptionFrench:
Réduit fortement le pouvoir de tout lanceur de sorts touché par cette arme.

Les cibles subissent un malus de -[1] aux jets d'attaque de sort et au DD du jet de sauvegarde contre leurs sorts, ainsi qu'un désavantage sur leurs jets de sauvegarde pour maintenir leur concentration pendant [2] tours.

MAG_SHA_SharBlessing_Spear_Passive.Name: MAG_SHA_SharBlessing_Spear_Passive
MAG_SHA_SharBlessing_Spear_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while Lightly or Heavily Obscured. This weapon deals an additional [1] to creatures that are Lightly or Heavily Obscured.
MAG_SHA_SharBlessing_Spear_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur vos <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> tant que vous vous trouvez dans une zone à visibilité réduite ou nulle. Cette arme inflige [1] supplémentaires aux créatures se trouvant dans une zone à visibilité réduite ou nulle.

MAG_SHA_SeluneBlessing_Spear_Passive.Name: MAG_SHA_SeluneBlessing_Spear_Passive
MAG_SHA_SeluneBlessing_Spear_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
MAG_SHA_SeluneBlessing_Spear_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Sagesse et les <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> de Perception.

MAG_TWN_Brewery_Greatclub_Passive.Name: MAG_TWN_Brewery_Greatclub_Passive
MAG_TWN_Brewery_Greatclub_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Acquire augmentations after being struck by different sources of damage. (e.g. acquire <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_ACID">Brewery Club: Acid</LSTag> when struck by Acid damage).
MAG_TWN_Brewery_Greatclub_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous gagnez des augmentations après avoir subi différentes sortes de dégâts (par exemple, le fait de subir des dégâts d'acide vous permet de gagner <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_ACID">Gourdin du Brasseur, acide</LSTag>).
MAG_TWN_Brewery_Greatclub_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(IsDamageTypeAcid()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_ACID, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypeCold()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_COLD, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypeFire()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_FIRE, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypeLightning()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_LIGHTNING, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypePoison()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_POISON, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypePsychic()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_PSYCHIC, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypeRadiant()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_RADIANT, 100, 3);IF(IsDamageTypeForce() or IsDamageTypeSlashing() or IsDamageTypePiercing() or IsDamageTypeBludgeoning() or IsDamageTypeThunder()):ApplyStatus(MAG_TWN_BREWERY_CLUB_PHYS_FORCE_THUNDER, 100, 3)

MAG_Thorn_Blade_Passive.Name: MAG_Thorn_Blade_Passive
MAG_Thorn_Blade_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: While <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrating</LSTag>, your melee weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
MAG_Thorn_Blade_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Tant que vous vous <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrez</LSTag>, vos attaques à l'arme de corps à corps infligent [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_TWN_Tollhouse_Fortune_Morningstar_Pa.Name: MAG_TWN_Tollhouse_Fortune_Morningstar_Passive
MAG_TWN_Tollhouse_Fortune_Morningstar_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: When you roll [1] or less with this weapon's damage die, reroll it and take the new result.
MAG_TWN_Tollhouse_Fortune_Morningstar_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous obtenez un résultat de [1] ou moins au jet de dégâts de cette arme, rejouez-le et prenez le nouveau résultat à la place.

ARM_SuperiorPadding_1_Passive.Name: ARM_SuperiorPadding_1_Passive
ARM_SuperiorPadding_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous subissez [1] points de dégâts contondants en moins.

ARM_SuperiorMaterial_1_Passive.Name: ARM_SuperiorMaterial_1_Passive
ARM_SuperiorMaterial_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous subissez [1] points de dégâts tranchants en moins.

ARM_SuperiorPlate_1_Passive.Name: ARM_SuperiorPlate_1_Passive
ARM_SuperiorPlate_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous subissez [1] points de dégâts perforants en moins.

ARM_Ambusher_1_Passive.Name: ARM_Ambusher_1_Passive
ARM_Ambusher_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative Rolls.
ARM_Ambusher_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Confère un bonus de +[1] aux jets d'initiative.

ARM_Elegant_1_Passive.Name: ARM_Elegant_1_Passive
ARM_Elegant_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain a +[1] bonus to Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>  and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
ARM_Elegant_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Confère un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> et <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> basés sur le Charisme.

ARM_Balance_1_Passive.Name: ARM_Balance_1_Passive
ARM_Balance_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain a +[1] bonus to Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>  and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
ARM_Balance_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Confère un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> et <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> basés sur la Dextérité.

ARM_BodyAid_1_Passive.Name: ARM_BodyAid_1_Passive
ARM_BodyAid_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain a +[1] bonus to Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>  and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
ARM_BodyAid_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Confère un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> et <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> basés sur la Force.

ARM_ExceptionalPlate_1_Passive.Name: ARM_ExceptionalPlate_1_Passive
ARM_ExceptionalPlate_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You take [1] less damage Slashing, Piercing, and Bludgeoning sources.
ARM_ExceptionalPlate_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous subissez [1] points de dégâts tranchants, perforants ou contondants en moins.

ARM_MagicalPlate_1_Passive.Name: ARM_MagicalPlate_1_Passive
ARM_MagicalPlate_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: All incoming damage is reduced by [1].
ARM_MagicalPlate_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Tous les dégâts reçus sont réduits de [1].

ARM_MartialArtsLethality_1_Passive.Name: ARM_MartialArtsLethality_1_Passive
ARM_MartialArtsLethality_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain a +[1] bonus to Unarmed <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">throwing</LSTag> attacks.
ARM_MartialArtsLethality_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Confère un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> à mains nues et aux dégâts des attaques de <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Throw_Throw">lancer</LSTag>.

ARM_Stealthy_1_Passive.Name: ARM_Stealthy_1_Passive
ARM_Stealthy_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain a +[1] bonus to Stealth <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>.
ARM_Stealthy_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Confère un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> de Discrétion.

BladeOfFrontiers.Name: BladeOfFrontiers
BladeOfFrontiers.DescriptionEnglish: The champion of the Sword Coast, renowned for his heroic deeds, unusual stone eye, and notable distaste for goblins.
BladeOfFrontiers.DescriptionFrench: Le champion de la Côte des Épées, connu pour ses exploits héroïques, son œil en pierre pour le moins surprenant, et sa haine farouche des gobelins.

CAMP_Volo_Lobotomy.Name: CAMP_Volo_Lobotomy
CAMP_Volo_Lobotomy.DescriptionEnglish: Eye socket damaged by Volo's 'experiment'.  -1 to <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> to Perception <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and cannot make <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
CAMP_Volo_Lobotomy.DescriptionFrench: Œil endommagé par la petite "expérience" de Volo. -1 en <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> de Perception, impossible de réussir le moindre <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">coup critique</LSTag>.

CAMP_Volo_ErsatzEye.Name: CAMP_Volo_ErsatzEye
CAMP_Volo_ErsatzEye.DescriptionEnglish: The damage wrought upon your ocular nerve during Volo's experiment is undone, allowing you to see <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag> creatures.
CAMP_Volo_ErsatzEye.DescriptionFrench: Les dégâts que Volo avait infligés à votre nerf optique sont réparés et vous pouvez désormais voir les créatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBILITY">invisibles</LSTag>.

QUEST_CRA_IntDev_Weakened.Name: QUEST_CRA_IntDev_Weakened
QUEST_CRA_IntDev_Weakened.DescriptionEnglish: Its journey through hell has severely weakened this creature's defences.
QUEST_CRA_IntDev_Weakened.DescriptionFrench: Traverser les Enfers a fortement affaibli les défenses de cette créature.

CHA_CompassSpear_Passive.Name: CHA_CompassSpear_Passive
CHA_CompassSpear_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the spear misses its target, the wielder's next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against that target gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TRUE_STRIKE">True Strike</LSTag>.
CHA_CompassSpear_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque la lance manque sa cible, le prochain <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jet d'attaque</LSTag> du porteur contre cette dernière bénéficie des effets de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TRUE_STRIKE">Coup au but</LSTag>.

CHA_ScribeOfTheDead.Name: CHA_ScribeOfTheDead
CHA_ScribeOfTheDead.DescriptionEnglish: Blessed by the Scribe of the Dead, this creature can continue casting spells from beyond the grave.
CHA_ScribeOfTheDead.DescriptionFrench: Bénue par le Scribe des Morts, cette créature peut continuer à lancer des sorts même par-delà la mort.

DEN_RaidingParty_GoblinCaptain_Gloves_Pa.Name: DEN_RaidingParty_GoblinCaptain_Gloves_Passive
DEN_RaidingParty_GoblinCaptain_Gloves_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: On a hit with a weapon attack, possibly inflict a -[1] penalty to the target's <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
DEN_RaidingParty_GoblinCaptain_Gloves_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Sur un coup au but au corps à corps, vous avez une chance d'infliger un malus de -[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de la cible.
DEN_RaidingParty_GoblinCaptain_Gloves_Pa.Conditions: IsWeaponAttack() and Character() and not Item()

DEN_Apprentice_DaggerOfShar_Passive.Name: DEN_Apprentice_DaggerOfShar_Passive
DEN_Apprentice_DaggerOfShar_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Deals an additional [1] if the target is not standing in sunlight.
DEN_Apprentice_DaggerOfShar_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires si la cible ne se trouve pas à la lumière du jour.

DEN_TunnelStaff_Passive.Name: DEN_TunnelStaff_Passive
DEN_TunnelStaff_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARING_STRIKE">Ensnare</LSTag> target if it is not a plant or a beast.
DEN_TunnelStaff_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Chance de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENSNARING_STRIKE">prendre la cible au piège</LSTag> si ce n'est pas une plante ni une bête sauvage.
DEN_TunnelStaff_Passive.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and not SavingThrow(Ability.Strength, 12) and not Tagged('BEAST') and not Tagged('PLANT') and not Self()

Quest_DEN_ARM_LuckyBoots_Passive.Name: Quest_DEN_ARM_LuckyBoots_Passive
Quest_DEN_ARM_LuckyBoots_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: %%% You can't shake off the feeling that with every attack, you're more likely to fail.

DEN_HalsinBlade_Passive.Name: DEN_HalsinBlade_Passive
DEN_HalsinBlade_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: The wielder takes [1] whenever they deal damage using this blade.
DEN_HalsinBlade_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur subit [1] chaque fois qu'il inflige des dégâts avec cette lame.

DEN_HellridersPride_Passive.Name: DEN_HellridersPride_Passive
DEN_HellridersPride_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you heal another creature, it gains resistance against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.
DEN_HellridersPride_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous soignez une autre créature, elle bénéficie d'une résistance aux dégâts contondants, perforants et tranchants infligés par les attaques à l'arme.

DEN_FaithwardenStaff_Passive.Name: DEN_FaithwardenStaff_Passive
DEN_FaithwardenStaff_Passive.DisplayNameFrench: Bâton de gardien de la foi
DEN_FaithwardenStaff_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Druidic vines cannot Ensnare you and do not count as difficult terrain.
DEN_FaithwardenStaff_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les lianes et ronces druidiques ne peuvent pas vous prendre au piège et ne comptent pas comme un terrain difficile pour vous.

DEN_CapturedGoblin_MurderDagger_Passive.Name: DEN_CapturedGoblin_MurderDagger_Passive
DEN_CapturedGoblin_MurderDagger_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Deals an additional [1] to creatures that are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KNOCKED_OUT">Knocked Out</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">Sleeping</LSTag>.
DEN_CapturedGoblin_MurderDagger_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires aux créatures <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KNOCKED_OUT">assommées</LSTag> ou <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">en train de dormir</LSTag>.
DEN_CapturedGoblin_MurderDagger_Passive.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and (HasStatus('SLEEPING') or HasStatus('SLEEP') or HasStatus('KNOCKED_OUT'))

FOR_TrueSoul_SpearPassive.Name: FOR_TrueSoul_SpearPassive
FOR_TrueSoul_SpearPassive.DescriptionEnglish: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> targets that fail a Dexterity saving throw. Deals an additional [1] to certain creatures that sport multiple sets of eyes.
FOR_TrueSoul_SpearPassive.DescriptionFrench: A une chance d'aveugler la cible. Inflige [1] supplémentaires à certaines créatures ayant plusieurs paires d'yeux.

FOR_OwlbearCubs_Armor_Passive.Name: FOR_OwlbearCubs_Armor_Passive
FOR_OwlbearCubs_Armor_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Undead creatures that hit the wearer receive [1]. Beasts that hit the wearer deal an additional [1].
FOR_OwlbearCubs_Armor_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les morts-vivants qui touchent le porteur reçoivent [1]. Les bêtes sauvages qui touchent le porteur lui infligent [1] supplémentaires.

FOR_OwlBearCubs_EasilyFrighten_Passive.Name: FOR_OwlBearCubs_EasilyFrighten_Passive
FOR_OwlBearCubs_EasilyFrighten_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Will flee for 2 turns when badly hurt.
FOR_OwlBearCubs_EasilyFrighten_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Fuit pendant 2 tours s'il est gravement blessé.

FOR_BottomlessWell_WebSensePassive.Name: FOR_BottomlessWell_WebSensePassive
FOR_BottomlessWell_WebSensePassive.DescriptionEnglish: Knows the exact location of anything that touches its webs.
FOR_BottomlessWell_WebSensePassive.DescriptionFrench: Sait exactement où se trouve tout ce qui touche ses toiles.

FOR_NightWalkers_WebImmunity.Name: FOR_NightWalkers_WebImmunity
FOR_NightWalkers_WebImmunity.DescriptionEnglish: Can't be Enwebbed, Entangled, or Ensnared and can't slip on grease or ice.
FOR_NightWalkers_WebImmunity.DescriptionFrench: Immunise contre Entoilement, Enchevêtré et Pris au piège, tout en empêchant de glisser sur la glace ou la graisse.

FOR_WebStaff_Passive.Name: FOR_WebStaff_Passive
FOR_WebStaff_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Immune to being Enwebbed. Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is not affected by web surfaces.
FOR_WebStaff_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Immunisé contre l'Entoilement. Votre <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">vitesse de déplacement</LSTag> n'est pas affectée par les surfaces de type toiles.

FOR_SpiderQueen_Robe_Passive.Name: FOR_SpiderQueen_Robe_Passive
FOR_SpiderQueen_Robe_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer casts a spell that deals Poison damage, it deals an additional [1].
FOR_SpiderQueen_Robe_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur lance un sort causant des dégâts de poison, celui-ci inflige [1] supplémentaires.

GOB_PainPriest_Dagger_Passive.Name: GOB_PainPriest_Dagger_Passive
GOB_PainPriest_Dagger_Passive.DisplayNameFrench: Bénédiction de la Sainte Vierge des Douleurs
GOB_PainPriest_Dagger_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: After a successful attack with this dagger, the wielder receives a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> until the end of their next turn.
GOB_PainPriest_Dagger_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsqu'il touche sa cible à l'aide de cette dague, le porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de 1d4 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.

GOB_PainPriest_Scourge_Passive.Name: GOB_PainPriest_Scourge_Passive
GOB_PainPriest_Scourge_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Grants resistance to Necrotic damage. Deals an additional [1] to nearby targets, including the wielder.
GOB_PainPriest_Scourge_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Octroie une résistance aux dégâts nécrotiques. Inflige [1] supplémentaires aux cibles proches, porteur compris.

GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive.Name: GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive
GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive.DisplayNameFrench: Fléau de la Maîtresse du Fouet
GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Chance to inflict upon the target a 1d4 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. If the attacker still has 25% or more <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, they take [1] themselves.
GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Chance d'infliger à la cible un malus de 1d4 sur les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>. Si l'attaquant a encore au moins 25% de ses <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag>, il subit [1].
GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: A Baned creature receives a 1d4 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
GOB_PainPriest_Axe_Passive.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Une créature victime d'Imprécation subit un malus de 1d4 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>.

GOB_Priest_Amulet_Passive.Name: GOB_Priest_Amulet_Passive
GOB_Priest_Amulet_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If the wearer bears the Absolute's Brand, they have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Death <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
GOB_Priest_Amulet_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur a la marque de l'Absolue, il bénéficie d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur ses <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> contre la mort.

GOB_Torturer_Spear_Passive.Name: GOB_Torturer_Spear_Passive
GOB_Torturer_Spear_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Tortured creatures may receive <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
GOB_Torturer_Spear_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les créatures torturées peuvent subir un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Constitution.

GOB_LostBalance_Passive.Name: GOB_LostBalance_Passive
GOB_LostBalance_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When hit, must succeed a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or fall Prone.
GOB_LostBalance_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le personnage est touché, il doit réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Force <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DD</LSTag> 8 sous peine de tomber à terre.

GOB_Pens_Dagger_Passive.Name: GOB_Pens_Dagger_Passive
GOB_Pens_Dagger_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Goblins have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the wielder.
GOB_Pens_Dagger_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les gobelins subissent un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur leurs <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> contre le porteur.

GOB_DrowCommander_Mace_Passive.Name: GOB_DrowCommander_Mace_Passive
GOB_DrowCommander_Mace_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per short rest, you can encase a target in <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FAERIE_FIRE">Faerie Fire</LSTag> for [1] turns if you miss an attack against it.
GOB_DrowCommander_Mace_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois entre deux <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">courts repos</LSTag>, vous pouvez entourer la cible de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FAERIE_FIRE">Lueurs féériques</LSTag> pendant [1] tours si vous ratez une attaque contre elle.

GOB_CalmnessInPain.Name: GOB_CalmnessInPain
GOB_CalmnessInPain.DescriptionEnglish: When you have 30% or fewer <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you get +2 on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
GOB_CalmnessInPain.DescriptionFrench: Quand il vous reste 30% de votre <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum de points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, vous bénéficiez d'un bonus de +2 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> basés sur la Sagesse.

GOB_Boss_RecklessAttack.Name: GOB_Boss_RecklessAttack
GOB_Boss_RecklessAttack.DescriptionEnglish: This goblin can make an additional free attack after making a Main Hand Attack, but the second attack has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on its <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
GOB_Boss_RecklessAttack.DescriptionFrench: Ce gobelin peut porter une attaque gratuite supplémentaire après une attaque à l'aide de la main principale, mais cette seconde attaque subit un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> au <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jet d'attaque</LSTag>.

GOB_Priest_Shield_Passive.Name: GOB_Priest_Shield_Passive
GOB_Priest_Shield_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If the wielder bears the Absolute's Brand, they gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
GOB_Priest_Shield_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur a la marque de l'Absolue, il bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>.

QUEST_HAG_HagEyed.Name: QUEST_HAG_HagEyed
QUEST_HAG_HagEyed.DescriptionEnglish:
Auntie Ethel has kissed an eye and taken its sight.

Has a +[1] bonus to Intimidation Checks, but can't make Critical Hits and has Disadvantage on Perception Checks.
QUEST_HAG_HagEyed.DescriptionFrench:
L'œil embrassé par Tatie Ethel n'y voit plus.

+[1] aux tests d'Intimidation, mais impossible de réussir le moindre coup critique et désavantage sur les tests de Perception.

HAG_HagMask.Name: HAG_HagMask
HAG_HagMask.DescriptionFrench: Tatie Ethel vous accueille à bras ouverts, trésor.

HAG_LowerDeathSavingThrows.Name: HAG_LowerDeathSavingThrows
HAG_LowerDeathSavingThrows.DescriptionEnglish: Makes it easier for the wearer to succeed Death Saving Throws.
HAG_LowerDeathSavingThrows.DescriptionFrench: Augmente les chances de réussite du porteur lors des jets de sauvegarde contre la mort.

HAG_KillerFrogReaction.Name: HAG_KillerFrogReaction
HAG_KillerFrogReaction.DescriptionEnglish: When an enemy makes a melee attack against the frog, they need to succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or succumb to Madness for two turns.
HAG_KillerFrogReaction.DescriptionFrench: Quand un ennemi attaque la grenouille au corps à corps, il doit réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Constitution pour ne pas succomber à la démence pendant deux tours.
HAG_KillerFrogReaction.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Mad creatures lose control of themselves and become hostile to everyone around them.
HAG_KillerFrogReaction.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures folles perdent le contrôle de leurs actes et deviennent hostiles envers tous ceux qui les entourent.

HAG_MaskOfVengeance.Name: HAG_MaskOfVengeance
HAG_MaskOfVengeance.DescriptionEnglish: Creature gains an extra reaction. When attacked, the creature can use a reaction to counterattack with Vengeful Strike, dealing [1] and [2].
HAG_MaskOfVengeance.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature gagne une réaction supplémentaire. Quand on l'attaque, elle peut utiliser une réaction pour contre-attaquer à l'aide d'Attaque vengeresse, ce qui inflige [1] et [2].
HAG_MaskOfVengeance.Conditions: HasActionResource('ReactionActionPoint', 1, 0, false) and Enemy() and not DistanceToTargetGreaterThan(2.0) and Combat() and not WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', false, false) and HasLastAttackTriggered()

HAG_Hair_STR_Passive.Name: HAG_Hair_STR_Passive
HAG_Hair_STR_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Strength.
HAG_Hair_STR_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le fait de manger le scalp chevelu de Tatie Ethel vous a offert une augmentation de Force permanente.

HAG_Hair_CON_Passive.Name: HAG_Hair_CON_Passive
HAG_Hair_CON_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Constitution.
HAG_Hair_CON_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le fait de manger le scalp chevelu de Tatie Ethel vous a offert une augmentation de Constitution permanente.

HAG_Hair_DEX_Passive.Name: HAG_Hair_DEX_Passive
HAG_Hair_DEX_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Dexterity.
HAG_Hair_DEX_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le fait de manger le scalp chevelu de Tatie Ethel vous a offert une augmentation de Dextérité permanente.

HAG_Hair_INT_Passive.Name: HAG_Hair_INT_Passive
HAG_Hair_INT_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Intelligence.
HAG_Hair_INT_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le fait de manger le scalp chevelu de Tatie Ethel vous a offert une augmentation d'Intelligence permanente.

HAG_Hair_WIS_Passive.Name: HAG_Hair_WIS_Passive
HAG_Hair_WIS_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Wisdom.
HAG_Hair_WIS_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le fait de manger le scalp chevelu de Tatie Ethel vous a offert une augmentation de Sagesse permanente.

HAG_Hair_CHA_Passive.Name: HAG_Hair_CHA_Passive
HAG_Hair_CHA_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Eating Ethel's hairy scalp has granted you a permanent boost to Charisma.
HAG_Hair_CHA_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le fait de manger le scalp chevelu de Tatie Ethel vous a offert une augmentation de Charisme permanente.

PLA_DyingHyena_Passive.Name: PLA_DyingHyena_Passive
PLA_DyingHyena_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Bloated with the spoils of slaughter, but still hungry - a new gnoll is growing in the hyena's belly.
PLA_DyingHyena_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Bien que son estomac soit distendu par son récent festin, le gnoll qui grandit dans le ventre de la hyène est toujours aussi affamé.

PLA_ConflictedFlind_Flail_Broken_Passive.Name: PLA_ConflictedFlind_Flail_Broken_Passive
PLA_ConflictedFlind_Flail_Broken_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Hitting an enemy with this weapon heals the wielder for [1] - but they can go <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Mad</LSTag> if they don't continue hitting an enemy each turn.
PLA_ConflictedFlind_Flail_Broken_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Infliger des dégâts à l'aide de cette arme soigne le porteur de [1], mais il risque de sombrer dans la <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">folie</LSTag> s'il ne parvient pas à toucher un ennemi à chaque tour.
PLA_ConflictedFlind_Flail_Broken_Passive.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and Character() and not Self() and not Ally()

UND_Myco_Alchemist_HealerGloves_Passive.Name: UND_Myco_Alchemist_HealerGloves_Passive
UND_Myco_Alchemist_HealerGloves_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If the wearer heals a Poisoned creature, it is no longer Poisoned.
UND_Myco_Alchemist_HealerGloves_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur de ces gants soigne une créature empoisonnée, celle-ci est guérie de l'empoisonnement.

UND_DuergarRaft_PestKillerAxe_Passive.Name: UND_DuergarRaft_PestKillerAxe_Passive
UND_DuergarRaft_PestKillerAxe_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Deals an additional [1] to Plants, Insects or Small creatures.
UND_DuergarRaft_PestKillerAxe_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires aux plantes, aux insectes et aux créatures de petite taille.
UND_DuergarRaft_PestKillerAxe_Passive.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and (TargetSizeEqualOrSmaller(Size.Small) or Tagged('PLANT',context.Target) or Tagged('MYCONID',context.Target) )

UND_DuergarRaft_Hammer_Passive.Name: UND_DuergarRaft_Hammer_Passive
UND_DuergarRaft_Hammer_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You knock nearby foes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> after killing a hostile target or landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
UND_DuergarRaft_Hammer_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous faites tomber les ennemis proches <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">à terre</LSTag> après avoir tué une cible ou réussi un <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">coup critique</LSTag>.
UND_DuergarRaft_Hammer_Passive.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and not IsMiss() and not IsCriticalMiss() and Character() and Enemy() and (IsCritical() or IsKillingBlow())

UND_Duergar_ShortswordOfFirstBlood_Passi.Name: UND_Duergar_ShortswordOfFirstBlood_Passive
UND_Duergar_ShortswordOfFirstBlood_Passi.DescriptionEnglish: Deals an additional [1] to targets that still have all their <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
UND_Duergar_ShortswordOfFirstBlood_Passi.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires aux cibles ayant encore tous leurs <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag>.
UND_Duergar_ShortswordOfFirstBlood_Passi.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and HasMaxHP() and IsAttack() and not IsMiss()

UND_ServantOfBoooal.Name: UND_ServantOfBoooal
UND_ServantOfBoooal.DescriptionEnglish: Chance to apply Bleeding to targets.
UND_ServantOfBoooal.DescriptionFrench: A une chance de provoquer une hémorragie chez les cibles.

UND_BlessingOfBOOOAL.Name: UND_BlessingOfBOOOAL
UND_BlessingOfBOOOAL.DescriptionEnglish:
BOOOAL, God of Murder, smiles upon you.

Advantage on Attack Rolls against Bleeding creatures, as long as there are kuo-toa to worship BOOOAL and give him strength.
UND_BlessingOfBOOOAL.DescriptionFrench:
BOUUÂL, dieu du Meurtre, vous sourit.

Du moment qu'il y a des kuo-toas pour le vénérer et lui donner de la force, vos jets d'attaque contre les cibles souffrant d'une hémorragie bénéficient d'un avantage.

UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_MagicMissileNeck.Name: UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_MagicMissileNecklace_Passive
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_MagicMissileNeck.DescriptionEnglish: Shoot an additional dart whenever you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_MagicMissileNeck.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous lancez <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Projectile magique</LSTag>, vous tirez un trait de force supplémentaire.

UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_ResonanceStaff_P.Name: UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_ResonanceStaff_Passive
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_ResonanceStaff_P.DescriptionEnglish: If the wielder deals Acid, Fire, Lightning, Radiant or Necrotic damage, it becomes resistant to that damage type for 2 turns.
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_ResonanceStaff_P.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur inflige des dégâts d'acide, de feu, de foudre, radiants ou nécrotiques, il gagne une résistance à ce type de dégâts pendant 2 tours.
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_ResonanceStaff_P.Conditions: Character() and (HasDamageDoneForType(DamageType.Acid) or HasDamageDoneForType(DamageType.Lightning) or HasDamageDoneForType(DamageType.Fire) or HasDamageDoneForType(DamageType.Necrotic) or HasDamageDoneForType(DamageType.Radiant))

UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_PullingRing_Pass.Name: UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_PullingRing_Passive
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_PullingRing_Pass.DescriptionEnglish: You restore an additional [1] every time you heal another creature.
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_PullingRing_Pass.DescriptionFrench: Vous rendez [1] de plus chaque fois que vous soignez une autre créature.

UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_DarkvisionRing_P.Name: UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_DarkvisionRing_Passive
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_DarkvisionRing_P.DescriptionEnglish: The wearer can see in the dark up to [1].
UND_SocietyOfBrilliance_DarkvisionRing_P.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur peut voir dans le noir jusqu'à une distance de [1].

UNI_UND_RingOfMindShielding_Passive.Name: UNI_UND_RingOfMindShielding_Passive
UNI_UND_RingOfMindShielding_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
UNI_UND_RingOfMindShielding_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les effets de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">charme</LSTag>.

UND_Tower_StaffBlessMystra_Passive.Name: UND_Tower_StaffBlessMystra_Passive
UND_Tower_StaffBlessMystra_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Bless grants an additional 1d4 to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and Weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and an additional 2d4 to Spell Attack Rolls.
UND_Tower_StaffBlessMystra_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Bénédiction confère 1d4 supplémentaire aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> et aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> d'arme, et 2d4 supplémentaires aux jets d'attaque de sort.

UND_Nere_ShieldOfScreams.Name: UND_Nere_ShieldOfScreams
UND_Nere_ShieldOfScreams.DescriptionEnglish:
Protected by the screams of his enemies.

Armour Class increased by 3, and attackers take [1] when they hit Nere with a melee attack.
UND_Nere_ShieldOfScreams.DescriptionFrench:
Protégé par les hurlements de ses ennemis.

Classe d'armure augmentée de 3, et les assaillants subissent [1] quand ils touchent Nere à l'aide d'une attaque au corps à corps.

UND_AdamantineGolem_Aggro.Name: UND_AdamantineGolem_Aggro
UND_AdamantineGolem_Aggro.DescriptionEnglish: Grym always attacks the last creature that hit it if possible.
UND_AdamantineGolem_Aggro.DescriptionFrench: Si possible, Grym attaque systématiquement la dernière créature qui l'a touché.
UND_AdamantineGolem_Aggro.Conditions: not HasStatus('UND_ADMANTINEGOLEM_TAUNT',context.Source) and HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Hit) and not IsMiss() and not Self() and Enemy() and not Dead(context.Source)

UND_AdamantineGolem_Heat.Name: UND_AdamantineGolem_Heat
UND_AdamantineGolem_Heat.DescriptionEnglish: Made entirely from adamantine, this mass is about as heavy as a dragon, and nearly as indestructible. Only intense heat can soften the metal enough to be shaped.
UND_AdamantineGolem_Heat.DescriptionFrench: Intégralement réalisée en adamantium, un métal si résistant qu'il ne peut être façonné que quand on le soumet à une température extrêmement élevée, cette masse est à peu près aussi lourde qu'un dragon... et presque aussi indestructible.

UND_Justiciar_ChainShirt_Magic_Passive.Name: UND_Justiciar_ChainShirt_Magic_Passive
UND_Justiciar_ChainShirt_Magic_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: While Obscured by shadow, the wearer deals [1] to attackers that hit them with a melee attack.
UND_Justiciar_ChainShirt_Magic_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Tant qu'il est obscurci par les ombres, le porteur inflige [1] aux adversaires qui le touchent au corps à corps.
UND_Justiciar_ChainShirt_Magic_Passive.Conditions: not HasObscuredState(ObscuredState.Clear) and IsMeleeAttack() and not (IsMiss() or IsCriticalMiss()) and not IsRedirectedDamage()

UND_Justiciar_Helmet_Magic_Passive.Name: UND_Justiciar_Helmet_Magic_Passive
UND_Justiciar_Helmet_Magic_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: While Obscured by shadow, the wearer gains +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> when attacked.
UND_Justiciar_Helmet_Magic_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Tant qu'il est obscurci par les ombres, le porteur gagne +[1] à tous les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> quand il se fait attaquer.

UND_Elder_Warpick_Passive.Name: UND_Elder_Warpick_Passive
UND_Elder_Warpick_Passive.DescriptionFrench: En cas de coup au but, inflige Fracassé à la cible.
UND_Elder_Warpick_Passive.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Deep Delver deals an additional [1] against shattered targets.
UND_Elder_Warpick_Passive.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Creusefond inflige [1] supplémentaires aux cibles fracassées.
UND_Elder_Warpick_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(HasStatus('UND_HARDWORK_TARGET', context.Target) and not (IsMiss() or IsCriticalMiss())):DealDamage(1d4, Piercing,Magical);IF(not HasStatus('UND_HARDWORK_TARGET', context.Target) and not (IsMiss() or IsCriticalMiss())):ApplyStatus(UND_HARDWORK_TARGET,100, 3);

UND_Tower_AutomatonHalberd_Passive.Name: UND_Tower_AutomatonHalberd_Passive
UND_Tower_AutomatonHalberd_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Chance to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag> the wielder, unless it is a construct.
UND_Tower_AutomatonHalberd_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Peut <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">étourdir</LSTag> son détenteur, à moins que ce ne soit une créature artificielle.

UND_AbsoluteRing_Passive.Name: UND_AbsoluteRing_Passive
UND_AbsoluteRing_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If the wearer bears the Absolute's Brand, they deal [1] additional Thunder damage with Thunder damage spells and attacks.
UND_AbsoluteRing_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur a la marque de l'Absolue, il inflige [1] points de dégâts de tonnerre supplémentaires avec ses attaques et sorts de tonnerre.

UNI_Adamantine_CriticalVsItems_Passive.Name: UNI_Adamantine_CriticalVsItems_Passive
UNI_Adamantine_CriticalVsItems_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If an adamantine weapon hits an object, the hit is always critical.
UNI_Adamantine_CriticalVsItems_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si une arme en adamantium frappe un objet, cela se traduit toujours par un coup critique.
UNI_Adamantine_CriticalVsItems_Passive.Boosts: IF(Item(context.Target) and HasStatus('MAG_DIAMONDSBANE_TECHNICAL', GetAttackWeapon()) and IsWeaponAttack()):CriticalHit(AttackRoll,Success, ForcedAlways)

UNI_Bow_SpellslotRecharge_Passive.Name: UNI_Bow_SpellslotRecharge_Passive
UNI_Bow_SpellslotRecharge_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you regain a Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag> when you land a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with the Spellthief.
UNI_Bow_SpellslotRecharge_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois seulement avant son prochain <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">court repos</LSTag>, le voleur de sorts récupère un <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">emplacement de sort</LSTag> de niveau 1 quand il réussit un <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">coup critique</LSTag>.
UNI_Bow_SpellslotRecharge_Passive.Conditions: AttackedWithPassiveSourceWeapon() and HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Critical) and not HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Miss) and not Ally() and Character()

UNI_DoomAxe_Passive.Name: UNI_DoomAxe_Passive
UNI_DoomAxe_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Each strike fills the target with a chilling dread that prevents it from regaining <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>. Undead creatures also get <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
UNI_DoomAxe_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Chaque coup emplit la cible d'une terreur glaçante qui l'empêche de regagner des <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag>. Les morts-vivants subissent également un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur leurs <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag>.

UNI_RepeatStaff_Passive.Name: UNI_RepeatStaff_Passive
UNI_RepeatStaff_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: While the wielder is not wearing armour, they receive a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
UNI_RepeatStaff_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur de cet objet n'a pas d'armure, il bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] à ses <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>.

UNI_MassHealRing_Passive.Name: UNI_MassHealRing_Passive
UNI_MassHealRing_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you heal a creature, it gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> for [2] turns.
UNI_MassHealRing_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand vous soignez une créature, elle bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> pendant [2] tours.

UNI_MartyrAmulet_Passive.Name: UNI_MartyrAmulet_Passive
UNI_MartyrAmulet_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer stands in certain surfaces (such as fire) and casts a spell that deals damage, the target also suffers the surface's effects.
UNI_MartyrAmulet_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur se tient sur certaines surfaces (comme les flammes) et lance un sort infligeant des dégâts, sa cible subit également les effets de la surface.
UNI_MartyrAmulet_Passive.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Affected surfaces are fire, acid, caustic brine and poison.
UNI_MartyrAmulet_Passive.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les surfaces affectées sont le feu, l'acide, la saumure caustique et le poison.

MAG_Fire_IncreasedDamage_Passive.Name: MAG_Fire_IncreasedDamage_Passive
MAG_Fire_IncreasedDamage_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When dealing Fire damage, the wearer deals an additional [1].
MAG_Fire_IncreasedDamage_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur de cet objet inflige des dégâts de feu, il cause [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_Cold_IncreaseColdDamageOnCast_Passiv.Name: MAG_Cold_IncreaseColdDamageOnCast_Passive
MAG_Cold_IncreaseColdDamageOnCast_Passiv.DescriptionEnglish: When dealing Cold damage, the wielder deals an additional [1].
MAG_Cold_IncreaseColdDamageOnCast_Passiv.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur cause des dégâts de froid, il inflige [1] supplémentaires.
MAG_Cold_IncreaseColdDamageOnCast_Passiv.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: A Frostbitten creature that takes Cold damage will take an additional 1 Cold damage per turn of Frostbite remaining.
MAG_Cold_IncreaseColdDamageOnCast_Passiv.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Une créature souffrant d'engelures subit 1 point de dégâts de froid supplémentaire par tour d'engelures restant.

MAG_Cold_ChilledOnSpellDamage_Passive.Name: MAG_Cold_ChilledOnSpellDamage_Passive
MAG_Cold_ChilledOnSpellDamage_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Dealing Cold damage with a spell possibly inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Chilled</LSTag> upon the target.
MAG_Cold_ChilledOnSpellDamage_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Causer des dégâts de froid à l'aide de sorts a également une chance d'infliger l'effet <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILLED">Transi</LSTag> à la cible.

MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamage_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamage_Passive
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamage_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they deal an additional [1].
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamage_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur n'a plus que 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il inflige [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Passive
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they deal an additional [1].
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur n'a plus que 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il inflige [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Ranged_P.Name: MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Ranged_Passive
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Ranged_P.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they deal an additional [1].
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseDamagePsychic_Ranged_P.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur n'a plus que 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il inflige [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_LowHP_TemporaryHP_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_TemporaryHP_Passive
MAG_LowHP_TemporaryHP_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per Short Rest, if you are below 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> and take damage, you gain 8 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
MAG_LowHP_TemporaryHP_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois entre deux courts repos, si vous subissez des dégâts alors qu'il vous reste moins de 50% de votre <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum de points de vie</LSTag>, vous gagnez 8 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">PV temporaires</LSTag>.

MAG_LowHP_CounterOnDamage_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_CounterOnDamage_Passive
MAG_LowHP_CounterOnDamage_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less and is damaged by a melee attack, they deal [1] to the attacker.
MAG_LowHP_CounterOnDamage_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur se fait toucher par une attaque au corps à corps alors qu'il n'a plus que 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il inflige [1] à son attaquant.

MAG_LowHP_IncreaseSpeed_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_IncreaseSpeed_Passive
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseSpeed_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1].
MAG_LowHP_IncreaseSpeed_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur n'a plus que 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, sa <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">vitesse de déplacement</LSTag> augmente de [1].

MAG_LowHP_ResistanceFire_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_ResistanceFire_Passive
MAG_LowHP_ResistanceFire_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they have Fire Resistance.
MAG_LowHP_ResistanceFire_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur de cet objet n'a plus que 50% de son <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum de points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il bénéficie d'une résistance au feu.

MAG_LowHP_IgnoreAttackOfOpportunity_Pass.Name: MAG_LowHP_IgnoreAttackOfOpportunity_Passive
MAG_LowHP_IgnoreAttackOfOpportunity_Pass.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they don't provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
MAG_LowHP_IgnoreAttackOfOpportunity_Pass.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur de cet objet n'a plus que 50% de son <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum de points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il ne provoque plus d'<LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">attaques d'opportunité</LSTag>.

MAG_LowHP_BonusAction_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_BonusAction_Passive
MAG_LowHP_BonusAction_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer has 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they have an additional bonus action.
MAG_LowHP_BonusAction_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur n'a plus que 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il gagne une action bonus supplémentaire.

MAG_LowHP_1HP_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_1HP_Passive
MAG_LowHP_1HP_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, when you are reduced to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, retain 1 hit point instead.
MAG_LowHP_1HP_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois seulement entre deux <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">courts repos</LSTag>, lorsque vous devriez tomber à 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">point de vie</LSTag>, vous vous retrouvez à 1 point de vie à la place.

MAG_LowHP_IncreasedSpellDamage_Passive.Name: MAG_LowHP_IncreasedSpellDamage_Passive
MAG_LowHP_IncreasedSpellDamage_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Non-<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> spells deal an additional [1] damage when the wearer drops to half their hit points or lower.
MAG_LowHP_IncreasedSpellDamage_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les sorts autres que les <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">sorts mineurs</LSTag> infligent [1] supplémentaires quand le porteur n'a plus que la moitié de son <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum de points de vie</LSTag> ou moins.
MAG_LowHP_IncreasedSpellDamage_Passive.Conditions: HasSpellFlag(SpellFlags.Spell) and not IsCantrip() and HasHPPercentageWithoutTemporaryHPEqualOrLessThan(50, context.Source)

MAG_Fire_ApplyBurning_Passive.Name: MAG_Fire_ApplyBurning_Passive
MAG_Fire_ApplyBurning_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: The target must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> 8 Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_ApplyBurning_Passive.DescriptionFrench: La cible doit réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Constitution contre les sorts <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">DD</LSTag> 8 sous peine de subir l'effet <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Brûlure</LSTag>.

MAG_Fire_IncreaseSlashingDamageToBurning.Name: MAG_Fire_IncreaseSlashingDamageToBurning_Passive
MAG_Fire_IncreaseSlashingDamageToBurning.DescriptionEnglish: Deals an additional [1] to Burning targets.
MAG_Fire_IncreaseSlashingDamageToBurning.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires aux cibles affectées par Brûlure.

MAG_Fire_IncreasePiercingDamageToBurning.Name: MAG_Fire_IncreasePiercingDamageToBurning_Passive
MAG_Fire_IncreasePiercingDamageToBurning.DescriptionEnglish: Deals an additional [1] to Burning targets.
MAG_Fire_IncreasePiercingDamageToBurning.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires aux cibles affectées par Brûlure.

MAG_Fire_ApplyBurningOnFireDamage_Passiv.Name: MAG_Fire_ApplyBurningOnFireDamage_Passive
MAG_Fire_ApplyBurningOnFireDamage_Passiv.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals Fire damage, the target must succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or begin <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_ApplyBurningOnFireDamage_Passiv.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige des dégâts de feu, la cible doit réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Constitution sous peine de se mettre à <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">brûler</LSTag>.

MAG_Fire_BonusActionOnFireSpell_Passive.Name: MAG_Fire_BonusActionOnFireSpell_Passive
MAG_Fire_BonusActionOnFireSpell_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you deal Fire damage with a levelled spell, you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> yourself and gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> this round.
MAG_Fire_BonusActionOnFireSpell_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand vous infligez des dégâts de feu à l'aide d'un sort de niveau 1 ou plus, vous pouvez vous <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">brûler</LSTag> pour gagner une <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">action bonus</LSTag> au cours du round.

MAG_Healer_HealSelf_Passive.Name: MAG_Healer_HealSelf_Passive
MAG_Healer_HealSelf_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When healing another, the wearer regains [1].
MAG_Healer_HealSelf_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand il soigne quelqu'un d'autre, le porteur de cet objet récupère [1].

MAG_Healer_HealSelfPoisonWeapon_Passive.Name: MAG_Healer_HealSelfPoisonWeapon_Passive
MAG_Healer_HealSelfPoisonWeapon_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever the wearer is healed, their weapon becomes coated in magic and deals an additional [1].
MAG_Healer_HealSelfPoisonWeapon_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que le porteur de cette amulette reçoit des soins, son arme se retrouve enduite d'une aura magique qui inflige [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_Healer_DisengageOnHeal_Passive.Name: MAG_Healer_DisengageOnHeal_Passive
MAG_Healer_DisengageOnHeal_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer heals a creature, it automatically Disengages and won't trigger <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
MAG_Healer_DisengageOnHeal_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur de cet objet soigne une créature, celle-ci rompt automatiquement le combat, ce qui ne déclenche pas d'<LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">attaque d'opportunité</LSTag>.

MAG_Healer_TempHPOnHeal_Passive.Name: MAG_Healer_TempHPOnHeal_Passive
MAG_Healer_TempHPOnHeal_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer heals a target, it gains an additional 3 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
MAG_Healer_TempHPOnHeal_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur de cet objet soigne une cible, celle-ci gagne 3 <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">points de vie temporaires</LSTag> supplémentaires.

MAG_Shove_ACboost.Name: MAG_Shove_ACboost
MAG_Shove_ACboost.DescriptionEnglish: After shoving an enemy, the wearer gains a +1 to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> until their next turn.
MAG_Shove_ACboost.DescriptionFrench: Après avoir poussé un ennemi, le porteur de cet objet gagne +1 à sa <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">classe d'armure</LSTag> jusqu'à son prochain tour.

MAG_Shove_DealDamage.Name: MAG_Shove_DealDamage
MAG_Shove_DealDamage.DescriptionEnglish: You deal [1] when you <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShieldShove">Shove</LSTag> a creature.
MAG_Shove_DealDamage.DescriptionFrench: Vous infligez [1] lorsque vous <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShieldShove">bousculez</LSTag> une créature.

MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDash_Passive.Name: MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDash_Passive
MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDash_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashes</LSTag> or takes a similar action during combat, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for 3 turns.
MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDash_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur utilise <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Foncer</LSTag> ou une action similaire au combat, il gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Vélocité</LSTag> pendant 3 tours.

MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDamage_Passive.Name: MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDamage_Passive
MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDamage_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder hits an enemy with this weapon, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnDamage_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur touche un ennemi à l'aide de cette arme, il gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Vélocité</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.

MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnCombatStart_Passi.Name: MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnCombatStart_Passive
MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnCombatStart_Passi.DescriptionEnglish: At the start of combat, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for 3 turns.
MAG_Mobility_MomentumOnCombatStart_Passi.DescriptionFrench: Au début du combat, le porteur gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Vélocité</LSTag> pendant 3 tours.

MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Passive.Name: MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Passive
MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per turn, the wearer can reduce the duration of their <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> by 1 turn to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Action">Sprint</LSTag>.
MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois par tour, le porteur peut réduire la durée de sa <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Vélocité</LSTag> de 1 tour pour <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Rush_MAG_Mobility_SprintForMomentum_Action">sprinter</LSTag>.

MAG_Mobility_JumpOnDash_Passive.Name: MAG_Mobility_JumpOnDash_Passive
MAG_Mobility_JumpOnDash_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per turn, after the wearer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashes</LSTag> or takes a similar action, they can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> without using a bonus action.
MAG_Mobility_JumpOnDash_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois par tour, quand le porteur utilise <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">foncer</LSTag> ou une action similaire, il peut <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">sauter</LSTag> sans devoir utiliser d'action bonus.

MAG_Mobility_ExplosionOnJump_Passive.Name: MAG_Mobility_ExplosionOnJump_Passive
MAG_Mobility_ExplosionOnJump_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jumps</LSTag>, they deal [1] in a [2] radius upon landing.
MAG_Mobility_ExplosionOnJump_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">saute</LSTag>, il inflige [1] dans un rayon de [2] en retombant.

MAG_Mobility_LowHP_Momentum_Passive.Name: MAG_Mobility_LowHP_Momentum_Passive
MAG_Mobility_LowHP_Momentum_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: During combat, when the wearer starts their turn with 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for 1 turn.
MAG_Mobility_LowHP_Momentum_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Durant un combat, si le porteur commence son tour avec 50% de son maximum de <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Vélocité</LSTag> pendant 1 tour.

MAG_Violence_LowHP_Violence_Passive.Name: MAG_Violence_LowHP_Violence_Passive
MAG_Violence_LowHP_Violence_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: During combat, when the wearer starts their turn with 50% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for [1] turns.
MAG_Violence_LowHP_Violence_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Durant un combat, si le porteur commence son tour avec 50% de son <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">maximum de points de vie</LSTag> ou moins, il bénéficie de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Fureur</LSTag> pendant [1] tours.

MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDash_Passive.Name: MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDash_Passive
MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDash_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per turn, when you <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for [1] turns.
MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDash_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois par tour, lorsque vous <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">foncez</LSTag>, vous gagnez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Fureur</LSTag> pendant [1] tours.

MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDamaged_Passive.Name: MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDamaged_Passive
MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDamaged_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When an enemy damages the wearer, the wearer gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for 1 turn.
MAG_Violence_ViolenceOnDamaged_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand un ennemi inflige des dégâts au porteur, ce dernier gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Fureur</LSTag> pendant 1 tour.

MAG_Rage_TempHPOnExit_Passive.Name: MAG_Rage_TempHPOnExit_Passive
MAG_Rage_TempHPOnExit_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer chooses to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_EndRage">End their Rage</LSTag>, they gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
MAG_Rage_TempHPOnExit_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur choisit de <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_EndRage">mettre un terme</LSTag> à sa <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">rage</LSTag>, il gagne [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">points de vie temporaires</LSTag>.

MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_P.Name: MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_Passive
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_P.DescriptionEnglish: Your weapon hits hard enough to send your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag> for 1 turn.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_P.DescriptionFrench: Votre arme frappe assez fort pour que votre cible <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">vacille</LSTag> pendant 1 tour.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_P.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Reeling creatures have a -1 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for every turn remaining.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_P.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures en état de choc subissent un malus de -1 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> pour tous les tours restants.

MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff12versatile_.Name: MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff12versatile_OnDamage_Passive
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff12versatile_.DescriptionEnglish: Your weapon hits hard enough to send your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag> for 1 turn if you are holding it in one hand, and 2 turns if you are holding it in both.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff12versatile_.DescriptionFrench: Votre arme frappe assez fort pour que votre cible <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">vacille</LSTag> pendant 1 tour si vous la maniez à une main, ou pendant 2 tours si vous la maniez à deux mains.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff12versatile_.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Reeling creatures have a -1 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for every turn remaining.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff12versatile_.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures en état de choc subissent un malus de -1 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> pour tous les tours restants.

MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamage_P.Name: MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamage_Passive
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamage_P.DescriptionEnglish: Your weapon hits hard enough to send your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamage_P.DescriptionFrench: Votre arme frappe assez fort pour que votre cible <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">vacille</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamage_P.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Reeling creatures have a -1 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for every turn remaining.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamage_P.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures en état de choc subissent un malus de -1 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> pour tous les tours restants.

MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_S.Name: MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_Shield_Passive
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_S.DescriptionEnglish: When a melee attack misses you, the attacker is sent <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag> for [1] turns.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_S.DescriptionFrench: Quand une attaque au corps à corps vous rate, votre agresseur <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">vacille</LSTag> pendant [1] tours.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_S.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Reeling creatures have a -1 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for every turn remaining.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_S.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures en état de choc subissent un malus de -1 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> pour tous les tours restants.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamage_S.Conditions: IsMeleeAttack() and not HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Hit) and Character()

MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamaged_.Name: MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamaged_Passive
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamaged_.DescriptionEnglish: When a melee attack hits you, the attacker is sent <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamaged_.DescriptionFrench: Quand une attaque au corps à corps vous touche, votre agresseur <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">vacille</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamaged_.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Reeling creatures have a -1 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for every turn remaining.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff1_OnDamaged_.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures en état de choc subissent un malus de -1 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> pour tous les tours restants.

MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_.Name: MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_Passive
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_.DisplayNameFrench: Gros choc en retour de l'adamantium
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_.DescriptionEnglish: When a melee attack hits you, the attacker is sent <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">Reeling</LSTag> for 3 turns.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_.DescriptionFrench: Quand une attaque au corps à corps vous touche, votre agresseur <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ATTACK_DEBUFF">vacille</LSTag> pendant 3 tours.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Reeling creatures have a -1 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> for every turn remaining.
MAG_MeleeDebuff_AttackDebuff2_OnDamaged_.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Les créatures en état de choc subissent un malus de -1 aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> pour tous les tours restants.

MAG_INCREASED_DAMAGE_COLD_Passive.Name: MAG_INCREASED_DAMAGE_COLD_Passive
MAG_INCREASED_DAMAGE_COLD_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When taking Cold damage, take an additional [1] per turn of Frostbite remaining.
MAG_INCREASED_DAMAGE_COLD_Passive.DescriptionFrench: En subissant des dégâts de froid, encaisse [1] supplémentaires par tour d'Engelures restant.

MAG_ChargedLightning_ArmorMagicBoost_Pas.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_ArmorMagicBoost_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_ArmorMagicBoost_Pas.DescriptionEnglish: The wearer has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> as long as they have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_ArmorMagicBoost_Pas.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] à la <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">classe d'armure</LSTag> et aux <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>, du moment qu'il lui reste des <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_WeaponMagicBoost_Pa.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_WeaponMagicBoost_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_WeaponMagicBoost_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: While the wielder is imbued with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>, this weapon has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage.
MAG_ChargedLightning_WeaponMagicBoost_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Tant que le porteur a des <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>, cette arme bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et de dégâts.

MAG_ChargedLightning_UnarmedAttackAdvant.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_UnarmedAttackAdvantage_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_UnarmedAttackAdvant.DescriptionEnglish: While imbued with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>, attacks against metal constructs and foes wearing metal armour gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_UnarmedAttackAdvant.DescriptionFrench: Tant que le porteur a des <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>, les attaques qu'il porte contre les créatures artificielles en métal et les ennemis en armure métallique bénéficient d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnDamage_Pas.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnDamage_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnDamage_Pas.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder deals damage using this weapon, they gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnDamage_Pas.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur inflige des dégâts à l'aide de cette arme, il gagne [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnDamage_Pas.StatsFunctors: IF(not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_LIGHTNING_DAMAGE_ONCE_TECHNICAL,100, 0);IF(Character()):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_GENERATE_CHARGE_FX, 100, 0);IF(Character() and not IsDischargingLightning(context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING,100, 2);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_DURATION_TECHNICAL, 100, 1)

MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnSpellDamag.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnSpellDamage_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnSpellDamag.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder deals damage with a spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag>, they gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnSpellDamag.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur inflige des dégâts à l'aide d'un sort ou d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">sort mineur</LSTag>, il gagne [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnSpellDamag.StatsFunctors: IF(not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_LIGHTNING_DAMAGE_ONCE_TECHNICAL,100, 0);IF(Character()):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_GENERATE_CHARGE_FX, 100, 0);IF(Character() and not IsDischargingLightning(context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING,100, 2);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_DURATION_TECHNICAL, 100, 1)

MAG_ChargedLightning_Dash_Boots_Passive.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Dash_Boots_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Dash_Boots_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dashes</LSTag> or takes a similar action during combat, they gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Dash_Boots_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur utilise <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Foncer</LSTag> ou une action similaire au combat, il gagne [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectricSurface_Boo.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectricSurface_Boots_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectricSurface_Boo.DescriptionEnglish: If the wearer starts their turn on an electrified surface, they gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectricSurface_Boo.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur commence son tour de jeu sur une surface électrifiée, il gagne [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectrifyWater_Boot.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectrifyWater_Boots_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectrifyWater_Boot.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer stands in water during combat, it becomes electrified.
MAG_ChargedLightning_ElectrifyWater_Boot.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur se tient dans de l'eau durant un combat, il se retrouve électrifié.

MAG_ChargedLightning_Electrocute_Armor_P.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Electrocute_Armor_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Electrocute_Armor_P.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer takes damage while having <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>, the attacker must succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocked</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Electrocute_Armor_P.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur subit des dégâts en ayant cumulé des <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>, l'attaquant doit réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité sous peine de se retrouver <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">foudroyé</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Electrocute_Armor_P.Conditions: not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, 14, false, false, context.Source) and HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING')

MAG_ChargedLightning_TempHP_Helmet_Passi.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_TempHP_Helmet_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_TempHP_Helmet_Passi.DescriptionEnglish:
When the wearer gains Lightning Charges, they also gain [1] temporary hit points.

The temporary hit points disappear if the wearer runs out of Lightning Charges.
MAG_ChargedLightning_TempHP_Helmet_Passi.DescriptionFrench:
Lorsque le porteur gagne des charges de foudre, il gagne également [1] points de vie temporaires.

Ces derniers disparaissent si le porteur n'a plus de charges de foudre.

MAG_ChargedLightning_StaticDischarge_Amu.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_StaticDischarge_Amulet_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_StaticDischarge_Amu.DescriptionEnglish: Consume [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag> activate an electrical shroud that deals [2]. Hostile creatures in the shroud must succeed a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shocked</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_StaticDischarge_Amu.DescriptionFrench: Consomme [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag> pour activer un voile électrique infligeant [2]. Les créatures hostiles dans la zone d'effet doivent réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité sous peine de se retrouver <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">électrocutées</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_Pull_Glove_Passive.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Pull_Glove_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Pull_Glove_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer shoves a target, they may consume [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag> to also inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Shock</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Pull_Glove_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur pousse une cible, il a la possibilité de consommer [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charge de foudre</LSTag> pour infliger également l'état <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED">Électrocuté</LSTag> à la cible.

MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamage_Ring_Pa.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamage_Ring_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamage_Ring_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: When you deal Lightning damage, deal an additional [1].
MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamage_Ring_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Quand vous causez des dégâts de foudre, vous infligez [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_ChargedLightning_Resistance_Ring_Pas.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Resistance_Ring_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Resistance_Ring_Pas.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur ne peut pas se faire <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">électrocuter</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_ChargeOnTakeDamage_.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_ChargeOnTakeDamage_Cloak_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_ChargeOnTakeDamage_.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer takes damage, gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charge</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_ChargeOnTakeDamage_.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque le porteur subit des dégâts, il gagne [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charge de foudre</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_LightningDischarge_.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_LightningDischarge_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_LightningDischarge_.StatsFunctors: IF(not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_AURA_TECHNICAL', context.Source) and IsDischargingLightning(context.Source) and not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_LIGHTNING_DISCHARGE_ONCE_TECHNICAL', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_DISCHARGE_DAMAGE, 100, 0);IF(IsDischargingLightning(context.Source) and not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_LIGHTNING_DISCHARGE_ONCE_TECHNICAL', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_GENERATE_CHARGE_FX, 100, 0);IF(IsDischargingLightning(context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_LIGHTNING_DISCHARGE_ONCE_TECHNICAL, 100, 0);IF(not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_AURA_TECHNICAL', context.Source) and IsDischargingLightning(context.Source)):SetStatusDuration(SELF,MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING,-5,Add);

MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamageSpell_Pa.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamageSpell_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamageSpell_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: While you have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>, deal an additional [1] Lightning damage on Lightning spells and <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_ExtraDamageSpell_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Tant qu'il vous reste des <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>, vous infligez [1] points de dégâts de foudre supplémentaires avec vos sorts de foudre et vos <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">sorts mineurs</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_EnsnaringShock_Pass.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_EnsnaringShock_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_EnsnaringShock_Pass.DescriptionEnglish: When the target moves, create a Lightning explosion with [1] radius that deals [2].
MAG_ChargedLightning_EnsnaringShock_Pass.DescriptionFrench: Quand la cible se déplace, génère une explosion de foudre qui inflige [2] dans un rayon de [1].

MAG_ChargedLightning_AbilityCheckBoost_P.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_AbilityCheckBoost_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_AbilityCheckBoost_P.DescriptionEnglish: The wearer has +[1] to Strength and Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>, as long as they have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_AbilityCheckBoost_P.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] à ses <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> de Force et de Dextérité, du moment qu'il lui reste des <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.

MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnUnarmedDam.Name: MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnUnarmedDamage_Passive
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnUnarmedDam.DescriptionEnglish: On a hit with an unarmed attack, the wearer gains [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnUnarmedDam.DescriptionFrench: Sur un coup au but lors d'une attaque à mains nues, le porteur gagne [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">charges de foudre</LSTag>.
MAG_ChargedLightning_Charge_OnUnarmedDam.StatsFunctors: IF(not HasStatus('MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_LIGHTNING_DAMAGE_ONCE_TECHNICAL,100, 0);IF(Character()):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_GENERATE_CHARGE_FX, 100, 0);IF(Character() and not IsDischargingLightning(context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING,100, 2);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING_DURATION_TECHNICAL, 100, 1)

MAG_BardicInspiration_TempHP_Armor_Passi.Name: MAG_BardicInspiration_TempHP_Armor_Passive
MAG_BardicInspiration_TempHP_Armor_Passi.DescriptionEnglish: When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, you gain [1].
MAG_BardicInspiration_TempHP_Armor_Passi.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous offrez un regain d'inspiration à un allié en utilisant <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Inspiration de barde</LSTag>, vous récupérez également [1].

MAG_BardicInspiration_Heal_Hat_Passive.Name: MAG_BardicInspiration_Heal_Hat_Passive
