MAG_BardicInspiration_Heal_Hat_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you inspire an ally using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Bardic Inspiration</LSTag>, they also regain [1].
MAG_BardicInspiration_Heal_Hat_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous offrez un regain d'inspiration à un allié en utilisant <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_BardicInspiration">Inspiration de barde</LSTag>, votre compagnon récupère également [1].

MAG_Paladin_LayOnHandsSupport_Gloves_Pas.Name: MAG_Paladin_LayOnHandsSupport_Gloves_Passive
MAG_Paladin_LayOnHandsSupport_Gloves_Pas.DescriptionEnglish: When you use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">Channel Oath</LSTag> spells, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEROISM">Heroism</LSTag>.
MAG_Paladin_LayOnHandsSupport_Gloves_Pas.DescriptionFrench: Vous gagnez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEROISM">Héroïsme</LSTag> lorsque vous utilisez vos sorts de <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ChannelOath">canalisation de serment</LSTag>.

MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet_Pa.Name: MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet_Passive
MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: When you apply a condition with one of your Smite spells, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous infligez un état à la cible à l'aide de l'un de vos sorts de type Frappe, vous gagnez un nombre de <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">points de vie temporaires</LSTag> égal à votre <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">modificateur</LSTag> de Charisme.
MAG_Paladin_SmiteSpellsSupport_Helmet_Pa.Conditions: StatusId('BLINDING_SMITE_BLINDED') or StatusId('BRANDING_SMITE') or StatusId('SEARING_SMITE') or StatusId('FRIGHTENED') or StatusId('BANISHING_SMITE')

MAG_Paladin_MomentumOnConcentration_Boot.Name: MAG_Paladin_MomentumOnConcentration_Boots_Passive
MAG_Paladin_MomentumOnConcentration_Boot.DescriptionEnglish:
When you cast a spell that requires concentration, you gain Momentum for [1] turn.

While you are concentrating, you can't get knocked Prone or be moved against your will.
MAG_Paladin_MomentumOnConcentration_Boot.DescriptionFrench:
Lorsque vous lancez un sort nécessitant de la concentration, vous gagnez Vélocité.

Pendant que vous vous concentrez, vous ne pouvez pas être poussé ni jeté à terre.

HAV_Phasm_ParalizingAttacks.Name: HAV_Phasm_ParalizingAttacks
HAV_Phasm_ParalizingAttacks.DescriptionEnglish: This creature's attack deals additional Acid damage and may inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysed</LSTag>.
HAV_Phasm_ParalizingAttacks.DescriptionFrench: Les attaques de cette créature infligent des dégâts d'acide supplémentaires et peuvent infliger l'état <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysie</LSTag>.

SCL_Raven_Hardcore.Name: SCL_Raven_Hardcore
SCL_Raven_Hardcore.DescriptionEnglish: Attacks from this creature can possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> the target.
SCL_Raven_Hardcore.DescriptionFrench: Les attaques de cette créature ont une chance d'<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">aveugler</LSTag> la cible.

SHA_NightsongPrison_SoulCage.Name: SHA_NightsongPrison_SoulCage
SHA_NightsongPrison_SoulCage.DescriptionEnglish: You can use the soul cage's powers yourself.
SHA_NightsongPrison_SoulCage.DescriptionFrench: Vous pouvez utiliser les pouvoirs de la cage spirituelle.

SHA_SharBlessing.Name: SHA_SharBlessing
SHA_SharBlessing.DescriptionEnglish: If Shar allows it, use this spear to kill Nightsong.
SHA_SharBlessing.DescriptionFrench: Si Shar le permet, vous pouvez utiliser cette lance pour tuer Chantenuit.

SHA_NightsongResurrection.Name: SHA_NightsongResurrection
SHA_NightsongResurrection.DescriptionEnglish: Blessed with the favour of a goddess, Nightsong cannot be permanently killed. When unconscious, the start of her turn she recovers 1 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag>.
SHA_NightsongResurrection.DescriptionFrench: Chantenuit a la faveur d'une déesse, ce qui l'empêche de mourir de manière permanente. Si jamais elle sombre dans l'inconscience, dès le début de son prochain tour, elle récupère 1 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">point de vie</LSTag>.

TWN_Brewer_Holly_Acid.Name: TWN_Brewer_Holly_Acid
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Acid.DescriptionEnglish: Staying close to this creature grants Resistance to Acid damage.
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Acid.DescriptionFrench: En restant à proximité de cette créature, vous bénéficiez d'une résistance aux dégâts d'acide.

TWN_Brewer_Holly_Cold.Name: TWN_Brewer_Holly_Cold
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Cold.DescriptionEnglish: Staying close to this creature grants Resistance to Cold damage.
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Cold.DescriptionFrench: En restant à proximité de cette créature, vous bénéficiez d'une résistance aux dégâts de froid.

TWN_Brewer_Holly_Fire.Name: TWN_Brewer_Holly_Fire
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Fire.DescriptionEnglish: Staying close to this creature grants Resistance to Fire damage.
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Fire.DescriptionFrench: En restant à proximité de cette créature, vous bénéficiez d'une résistance aux dégâts de feu.

TWN_Brewer_Holly_Lightning.Name: TWN_Brewer_Holly_Lightning
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Lightning.DescriptionEnglish: Staying close to this creature grants Resistance to Lightning damage.
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Lightning.DescriptionFrench: En restant à proximité de cette créature, vous bénéficiez d'une résistance aux dégâts de foudre.

TWN_Brewer_Holly_Poison.Name: TWN_Brewer_Holly_Poison
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Poison.DescriptionEnglish: Staying close to this creature grants Resistance to Poison damage.
TWN_Brewer_Holly_Poison.DescriptionFrench: En restant à proximité de cette créature, vous bénéficiez d'une résistance aux dégâts de poison.

TWN_TC_Visage_CursedGold.Name: TWN_TC_Visage_CursedGold
TWN_TC_Visage_CursedGold.DescriptionEnglish: This cursed visage controls part of the coins protecting the Toll Collector.
TWN_TC_Visage_CursedGold.DescriptionFrench: Ce visage maudit contrôle une partie des pièces protégeant la garde-barrière.

TWN_GithyankiWarlock_FormOfDread.Name: TWN_GithyankiWarlock_FormOfDread
TWN_GithyankiWarlock_FormOfDread.DescriptionEnglish: The Ch'r'ai has [1] and can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>. Each time she attacks a foe, that foe can become Frightened for 1 turn.
TWN_GithyankiWarlock_FormOfDread.DescriptionFrench: La ch'r'ai a [1] et ne peut pas être <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">effrayée</LSTag>. Chaque fois qu'elle attaque un adversaire, ce dernier peut se retrouver terrorisé pendant 1 tour.

TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Wisdom.Name: TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Wisdom
TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Wisdom.DescriptionEnglish: This Dark Justiciar was anointed by Shar as a sentinel of Wisdom, representing one of her most valued attributes in a follower. They have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and Spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Wisdom.DescriptionFrench: Ce Tribun de la Nuit a été choisi par Shar comme sentinelle de la Sagesse, incarnant ainsi l'un des attributs les plus recherchés chez les fidèles de la déesse. Il bénéficie d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur tous les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Sagesse et les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> de sort.

TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Intelligence.Name: TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Intelligence
TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Intelligence.DescriptionEnglish: This Dark Justiciar was anointed by Shar as a sentinel of Intelligence, representing one of her most valued attributes in a follower. They have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Intelligence <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and Spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Intelligence.DescriptionFrench: Ce Tribun de la Nuit a été choisi par Shar comme sentinelle de l'Intelligence, incarnant ainsi l'un des attributs les plus recherchés chez les fidèles de la déesse. Il bénéficie d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur tous les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> d'Intelligence et les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> de sort.

TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Charisma.Name: TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Charisma
TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Charisma.DescriptionEnglish: This Dark Justiciar was anointed by Shar as a sentinel of Charisma, representing one of her most valued attributes in a follower. They have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and Spell <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
TWN_PlaquePuzzle_Charisma.DescriptionFrench: Ce Tribun de la Nuit a été choisi par Shar comme sentinelle du Charisme, incarnant ainsi l'un des attributs les plus recherchés chez les fidèles de la déesse. Il bénéficie d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur tous les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Charisme et les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> de sort.

TWN_Nightdome_ReflectDamage.Name: TWN_Nightdome_ReflectDamage
TWN_Nightdome_ReflectDamage.DescriptionEnglish: Oliver's Nightdome won't allow for you to hurt him. Any damage done to the dome will be reflected in twofold to its attacker.
TWN_Nightdome_ReflectDamage.DescriptionFrench: Le dôme nocturne d'Olivier ne vous laisse pas faire du mal à ce dernier. Tous les dégâts infligés au dôme sont renvoyés à l'attaquant après avoir été doublés.

TWN_KuoToa_Storm.Name: TWN_KuoToa_Storm
TWN_KuoToa_Storm.DescriptionEnglish: Years of ambushing ships during lightning storms means that that this creature cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">Electrocuted</LSTag>.
TWN_KuoToa_Storm.DescriptionFrench: Habituée dès son plus jeune âge à attaquer les navires en pleine tempête, cette créature ne peut pas être <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHOCKED_SURFACE">électrocutée</LSTag>.

TWN_KuoToa_LightningDamage.Name: TWN_KuoToa_LightningDamage
TWN_KuoToa_LightningDamage.DescriptionEnglish: Successful weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
TWN_KuoToa_LightningDamage.DescriptionFrench: Vos attaques à l'arme réussies infligent [1] supplémentaires.

SHA_TortureTrial_Double.Name: SHA_TortureTrial_Double
SHA_TortureTrial_Double.DescriptionEnglish: Damaging a Reflection that is not your own causes Shar to intervene, reducing all <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityScore">Ability Scores</LSTag> by 1 until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. This reduction can stack up to 4 times.
SHA_TortureTrial_Double.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous infligez des dégâts à un reflet qui n'est pas le vôtre, Shar intervient, en réduisant toutes vos <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityScore">valeurs de caractéristique</LSTag> de 1 jusqu'à votre prochain <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long repos</LSTag>. Cumulable un maximum de 4 fois.

SHA_DarkVengeance.Name: SHA_DarkVengeance
SHA_DarkVengeance.DescriptionEnglish: The Justiciar has advantage against targets standing in darkness.
SHA_DarkVengeance.DescriptionFrench: Les Tribuns de la Nuit bénéficient d'un avantage contre les cibles qui se trouvent dans les ténèbres.

SHA_VisionOfShar.Name: SHA_VisionOfShar
SHA_VisionOfShar.DescriptionEnglish: The Justiciar can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
SHA_VisionOfShar.DescriptionFrench: Le Tribun ne peut pas être <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">aveuglé</LSTag>.

SHA_DarkLifeforce.Name: SHA_DarkLifeforce
SHA_DarkLifeforce.DescriptionEnglish: When reduced to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, this character immediately regains [1]. Only Radiant damage can prevent this resurrection.
SHA_DarkLifeforce.DescriptionFrench: Quand il tombe à 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">point de vie</LSTag>, ce personnage récupère immédiatement [1]. Seuls les dégâts radiants peuvent empêcher cette résurrection.

SHA_MistressKiss.Name: SHA_MistressKiss
SHA_MistressKiss.DescriptionEnglish: If this character starts a turn in darkness, it regains [1].
SHA_MistressKiss.DescriptionFrench: Si ce personnage commence son tour dans les ténèbres, il récupère [1].

CRE_Mindsteal_Link_Target.Name: CRE_Mindsteal_Link_Target
CRE_Mindsteal_Link_Target.DescriptionEnglish:
Being drained by Ch'r'ai W'wargaz.

Received a -[1] penalty on its Armour Class and is Vulnerable to Psychic damage.

Condition ends when the affected entity damages Ch'r'ai W'wargaz.
CRE_Mindsteal_Link_Target.DescriptionFrench:
Se fait ponctionner son énergie par le ch'r'ai W'wargaz.

Subit un malus de -[1] à la classe d'armure et est vulnérable aux dégâts psychiques.

Cet état s'achève lorsque l'entité affectée parvient à infliger des dégâts au ch'r'ai W'wargaz.

TWN_RatCatcher_Passive.Name: TWN_RatCatcher_Passive
TWN_RatCatcher_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against beasts have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
TWN_RatCatcher_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> contre les bêtes sauvages bénéficient d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag>.

MAG_Throw_Swap.Name: MAG_Throw_Swap
MAG_Throw_Swap.DescriptionEnglish: You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when throwing, and may swap positions with the target if they fail a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
MAG_Throw_Swap.DescriptionFrench: Vous gagnez un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jet d'attaque</LSTag> lorsque vous lancez votre arme, et vous pouvez échanger votre position avec celle de la cible si elle rate un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité.

MOO_KethericArmor.Name: MOO_KethericArmor
MOO_KethericArmor.DescriptionEnglish: When activated, you can't be moved against your will by any spell or action, but have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
MOO_KethericArmor.DescriptionFrench: Après activation, aucun sort ni aucune action ne peut vous faire bouger contre votre volonté, mais vous subissez un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité.

SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_A.Name: SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_Attack_Ability
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_A.DisplayNameEnglish: Improved Bardic Inspiration: Attack Roll or Ability Check
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_A.DisplayNameFrench: Inspiration de barde améliorée : Jet d'attaque ou test de caractéristique
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_A.DescriptionEnglish: Add a +[1] bonus to your next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Check</LSTag>.
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_A.DescriptionFrench: Ajoute un bonus de +[1] à votre prochain <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jet d'attaque</LSTag> ou <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">test de caractéristique</LSTag>.

SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_S.Name: SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_SavingThrow
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_S.DisplayNameFrench: Inspiration de barde améliorée : Jet de sauvegarde
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_S.DescriptionEnglish: Add a +[1] bonus to your next <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
SCE_TieflingFollowup_BardicInspiration_S.DescriptionFrench: Ajoute un bonus de [1] à votre prochain <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag>.

MAG_LC_Cyric_FearImmunity_Amulet_Passive.Name: MAG_LC_Cyric_FearImmunity_Amulet_Passive
MAG_LC_Cyric_FearImmunity_Amulet_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, and cannot be afflicted with other emotion-altering conditions.
MAG_LC_Cyric_FearImmunity_Amulet_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous ne pouvez pas être <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">effrayé</LSTag>, ni affecté par un autre état affectant les émotions.

CRE_BrainDamage_INT.Name: CRE_BrainDamage_INT
CRE_BrainDamage_INT.DescriptionEnglish: Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> has been reduced by 2 by the Zaith'isk. The githyanki device failed to harm your illithid parasite - perhaps consuming more would mend your broken mind.
CRE_BrainDamage_INT.DescriptionFrench: Votre <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> a été réduite de 2 par le zaith'isk. En revanche, la machine des githyankis n'a visiblement rien fait à votre parasite illithid, à tel point que vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de vous demander... peut-être que si vous absorbiez d'autres larves, cela pourrait réparer votre esprit endommagé.

CRE_BrainDamage_WIS.Name: CRE_BrainDamage_WIS
CRE_BrainDamage_WIS.DescriptionEnglish: Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> has been reduced by 2 by the Zaith'isk. The githyanki device failed to harm your illithid parasite - perhaps consuming more would mend your broken mind.
CRE_BrainDamage_WIS.DescriptionFrench: Votre <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Sagesse</LSTag> a été réduite de 2 par le zaith'isk. En revanche, la machine des githyankis n'a visiblement rien fait à votre parasite illithid, à tel point que vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de vous demander... peut-être que si vous absorbiez d'autres larves, cela pourrait réparer votre esprit endommagé.

CRE_BrainDamage_CON.Name: CRE_BrainDamage_CON
CRE_BrainDamage_CON.DescriptionEnglish: Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> has been reduced by 2 by the Zaith'isk. The githyanki device failed to harm your illithid parasite - perhaps consuming more would mend your broken mind.
CRE_BrainDamage_CON.DescriptionFrench: Votre <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> a été réduite de 2 par le zaith'isk. En revanche, la machine des githyankis n'a visiblement rien fait à votre parasite illithid, à tel point que vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de vous demander... peut-être que si vous absorbiez d'autres larves, cela pourrait réparer votre esprit endommagé.

CRE_GithInfirmary_Awakened.Name: CRE_GithInfirmary_Awakened
CRE_GithInfirmary_Awakened.DescriptionEnglish: You can use all of your Illithid Powers as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>. Your resistance to the zaith'isk in the githyanki infirmary awakened this power.
CRE_GithInfirmary_Awakened.DescriptionFrench: Vous pouvez utiliser n'importe lequel de vos pouvoirs d'illithid dans le cadre d'une <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">action bonus</LSTag>. Cette capacité a été réveillée en vous par votre résistance au zaith'isk de l'infirmerie githyanki.

SHA_FleshGolem_Berserk.Name: SHA_FleshGolem_Berserk
SHA_FleshGolem_Berserk.DescriptionEnglish: This entity will go <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHA_NECROMANCER_FLESH_BERSERK">Berserk</LSTag> if its health diminishes.
SHA_FleshGolem_Berserk.DescriptionFrench: Une véritable <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHA_NECROMANCER_FLESH_BERSERK">folie furieuse</LSTag> s'empare de cette entité si sa santé diminue.

ORI_Karlach_FirstUpgrade.Name: ORI_Karlach_FirstUpgrade
ORI_Karlach_FirstUpgrade.DescriptionEnglish:
The infernal engine that is Karlach's heart is burning more evenly.

She has Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed.
ORI_Karlach_FirstUpgrade.DescriptionFrench:
Le moteur infernal qui sert de cœur à Karlach brûle désormais de manière moins erratique.

Cela lui confère un avantage sur les jets de sauvegarde contre les effets de charme.

ORI_Karlach_SecondUpgrade.Name: ORI_Karlach_SecondUpgrade
ORI_Karlach_SecondUpgrade.DescriptionEnglish:
Infernal iron has anchored the war machine that is Karlach's heart.

She can touch others without burning them, and can no longer be Charmed.
ORI_Karlach_SecondUpgrade.DescriptionFrench:
La machine de guerre qui sert de cœur à Karlach est désormais ancrée par du fer infernal.

Elle peut à présent toucher les autres sans les brûler, et ne peut plus être charmée.

LOW_LiaraPortyr_Brave.Name: LOW_LiaraPortyr_Brave
LOW_LiaraPortyr_Brave.DescriptionEnglish: A stalwart heart grants the affected entity <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
LOW_LiaraPortyr_Brave.DescriptionFrench: La créature affectée est dotée d'une grande bravoure, ce qui lui confère un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> contre l'effet <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Effrayé</LSTag>.

LOW_GithProdigy_ReactiveDisplacement.Name: LOW_GithProdigy_ReactiveDisplacement
LOW_GithProdigy_ReactiveDisplacement.DescriptionEnglish: Using a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> after being damaged, Ptaris teleports as far as he can from the attacker.
LOW_GithProdigy_ReactiveDisplacement.DescriptionFrench: Quand il subit des dégâts, Ptaris utilise une <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">réaction</LSTag> pour se téléporter le plus loin possible de l'attaquant.

LOW_GithProdigy_PsionicSkin.Name: LOW_GithProdigy_PsionicSkin
LOW_GithProdigy_PsionicSkin.DescriptionEnglish: Removes all conditions at the start of its turns.
LOW_GithProdigy_PsionicSkin.DescriptionFrench: Dissipe tous les états au début de son tour.

LOW_GithProdigy_MentalImage_CullingStrik.Name: LOW_GithProdigy_MentalImage_CullingStrikes
LOW_GithProdigy_MentalImage_CullingStrik.DescriptionEnglish: The Mental Image creates a new Mental Image each time it hits a character with an attack.
LOW_GithProdigy_MentalImage_CullingStrik.DescriptionFrench: L'image mentale en crée une nouvelle chaque fois qu'elle touche un personnage à l'aide d'une attaque.

LOW_Potion_Master.Name: LOW_Potion_Master
LOW_Potion_Master.DescriptionEnglish: A potions master, Dolor can throw or drink potions as a free action.
LOW_Potion_Master.DescriptionFrench: Dolor est passé maître dans l'utilisation des potions. Il peut boire ou lancer une potion dans le cadre d'une action gratuite.

LOW_SerialKiller_Dolor_Ambush.Name: LOW_SerialKiller_Dolor_Ambush
LOW_SerialKiller_Dolor_Ambush.DescriptionEnglish: Any successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against a creature that has been <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOPPELGANGER_OFFBALANCE">Ambushed by a Doppelganger</LSTag> is a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
LOW_SerialKiller_Dolor_Ambush.DescriptionFrench: Tout <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jet d'attaque</LSTag> réussi contre une créature tombée dans une <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DOPPELGANGER_OFFBALANCE">embuscade de doppelgänger</LSTag> se traduit automatiquement par un <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">coup critique</LSTag>.

LOW_AncientLair_Curse.Name: LOW_AncientLair_Curse
LOW_AncientLair_Curse.DescriptionEnglish: Cursed by the rot of an undead's lair. After casting a spell, you receive [1] per Spell Level. Once the curse is removed, a character cannot be cursed this way again until they finish a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
LOW_AncientLair_Curse.DescriptionFrench: Maudit par la putréfaction régnant dans l'antre d'un mort-vivant. Après avoir lancé ce sort, vous recevez [1] par niveau du sort. Une fois la malédiction levée, un personnage ne peut plus être maudit de la sorte avant son prochain <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long repos</LSTag>.

LOW_Cazador_SpawnBuff_001_Passive.Name: LOW_Cazador_SpawnBuff_001_Passive
LOW_Cazador_SpawnBuff_001_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: %%%This character receives Mirror Image each turn. Tech passive, do not destub

LOW_GithProdigy_UnnaturalGrowth.Name: LOW_GithProdigy_UnnaturalGrowth
LOW_GithProdigy_UnnaturalGrowth.DescriptionFrench: A droit à 2 <LSTag Tooltip="Action">actions</LSTag> par round.

LOW_Guildhall_ExtraAttack_DaggerSpeciali.Name: LOW_Guildhall_ExtraAttack_DaggerSpecialist
LOW_Guildhall_ExtraAttack_DaggerSpeciali.DescriptionEnglish: This creature can throw up to 3 daggers per round.
LOW_Guildhall_ExtraAttack_DaggerSpeciali.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature peut lancer jusqu'à 3 dagues par round.

LOW_Guildhall_IsolatedPrey.Name: LOW_Guildhall_IsolatedPrey
LOW_Guildhall_IsolatedPrey.DescriptionEnglish: This creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against targets that that do not have allies with 5m.
LOW_Guildhall_IsolatedPrey.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature bénéficie d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> contre les cibles n'ayant aucun allié à moins de 5 mètres.

LOW_Guildhall_DaggerThrower.Name: LOW_Guildhall_DaggerThrower
LOW_Guildhall_DaggerThrower.DescriptionEnglish: This creature adds double their <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> to the damage they deal on ranged attacks made with daggers.
LOW_Guildhall_DaggerThrower.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature ajoute deux fois son <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">bonus de maîtrise</LSTag> aux dégâts qu'elle inflige sur ses attaques à distance à l'aide de dagues.

LOW_Guildhall_SneakyRiposte.Name: LOW_Guildhall_SneakyRiposte
LOW_Guildhall_SneakyRiposte.DescriptionEnglish: Strike a foe that just missed you with an attack, inflicting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> damage if you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
LOW_Guildhall_SneakyRiposte.DescriptionFrench: Frappe un adversaire qui vient tout juste de vous rater, ce qui lui inflige des dégâts d'<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">attaque sournoise</LSTag> si vous bénéficiez de l'<LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag>.
LOW_Guildhall_SneakyRiposte.Conditions: IsMeleeAttack() and IsMiss() and HasActionResource('ReactionActionPoint',1,0, false) and not (not Player() and Tagged('AI_IGNORED_TARGET',context.Source)) and not HasStatus('INVISIBILITY') and HasLastAttackTriggered()
LOW_Guildhall_SneakyRiposte.StatsFunctors: IF((TargetHasAdvantage() or HasAllyWithinRange('SG_Incapacitated',1.5,nil,nil,context.Source,context.Target)) and not TargetHasDisadvantage()):UseSpell(SWAP,Target_SneakAttack,true,true,true); IF( not ((TargetHasAdvantage() or HasAllyWithinRange('SG_Incapacitated',1.5,nil,nil,context.Source,context.Target)) and not TargetHasDisadvantage())):UseSpell(SWAP,Target_Riposte,true,true,true); UseActionResource(ReactionActionPoint,1)

LOW_Guildhall_AdaptableSneakAttacks.Name: LOW_Guildhall_AdaptableSneakAttacks
LOW_Guildhall_AdaptableSneakAttacks.DescriptionEnglish: This creature can perform a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">Sneak Attack</LSTag> with any weapon, not only those marked as Finesse.
LOW_Guildhall_AdaptableSneakAttacks.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature peut effectuer une <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SneakAttack">attaque sournoise</LSTag> avec n'importe quelle arme, pas seulement les armes de finesse.

LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Alcohol.Name: LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Alcohol
LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Alcohol.DescriptionEnglish: This Redcap's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_REDCAP_BLOODLUST">Bloodlust</LSTag> is subdued when there are traces of alcohol in a target's blood, which means they will primarily target creatures who are sober.
LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Alcohol.DescriptionFrench: La <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_REDCAP_BLOODLUST">soif de sang</LSTag> de ce bonnet-rouge s'atténue quand il détecte la présence d'alcool dans le sang de sa cible. En conséquence, il s'en prend en priorité aux adversaires sobres.

LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Buff.Name: LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Buff
LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Buff.DescriptionEnglish: As one of Ethel's loyal servants, this redcap's has an additional 40 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, their <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> scores are increased +2, and their attacks deal an additional [1] damage.
LOW_BlushingMermaid_Redcap_Buff.DescriptionFrench: Ce bonnet-rouge est l'un des loyaux serviteurs d'Ethel, ce qui lui confère 40 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">points de vie</LSTag> supplémentaires. De plus, ses valeurs de <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Force</LSTag> et de <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> sont augmentées de 2, et ses attaques infligent [1] points de dégâts supplémentaires.

LOW_HagSurvivors_Bloodlust.Name: LOW_HagSurvivors_Bloodlust
LOW_HagSurvivors_Bloodlust.DescriptionEnglish: %%% Technical status to add Bloodlust to Jatlo when he transforms.
LOW_HagSurvivors_Bloodlust.Conditions: not Dead() and not HasStatus('LOW_HAGSPY_DISGUISE') and not HasStatus('LOW_REDCAP_BLOODLUST')

LOW_Hag_Mushroom_ReactiveFungus.Name: LOW_Hag_Mushroom_ReactiveFungus
LOW_Hag_Mushroom_ReactiveFungus.DescriptionEnglish: The mushroom releases Pacifying Spores when it's damaged. Pacifying Spores make movement and taking actions impossible.
LOW_Hag_Mushroom_ReactiveFungus.DescriptionFrench: Ce champignon libère des spores pacifiantes quand il subit des dégâts. Ces spores empêchent de se déplacer ou d'effectuer des actions.

LOW_Hag_Mushroom_VFX.Name: LOW_Hag_Mushroom_VFX
LOW_Hag_Mushroom_VFX.Conditions: (HasStatus('BURNING') or HasStatus('SEARING_SMITE') or HasStatus('CHILL_TOUCH')) and HasStatus('LOW_HAG_MUSHROOM_VFX')

LOW_OskarsBeloved_HarrowingPresence.Name: LOW_OskarsBeloved_HarrowingPresence
LOW_OskarsBeloved_HarrowingPresence.DescriptionEnglish:
Mortal will frays and breaks around this powerful spirit. Creatures within [1] are Harrowed.

Undead creatures ignore this effect.
LOW_OskarsBeloved_HarrowingPresence.DescriptionFrench:
Cet esprit est si impressionnant pour les mortels que le seul fait de le voir épouvante les créatures situées à moins de [1].

N'affecte pas les morts-vivants.

LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Invisible.Name: LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Invisible
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Invisible.DescriptionEnglish: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_POLTERGEIST_INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> by nature, this creature can only be seen through magical means.
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Invisible.DescriptionFrench: Naturellement <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_POLTERGEIST_INVISIBLE">invisible</LSTag>, cette créature ne peut être vue que par des moyens magiques.
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Invisible.Conditions: not HasStatus('WET') and not HasStatus('FAERIE_FIRE') and not HasStatus('BRANDING_SMITE') and not HasStatus('SEE_INVISIBILITY_REVEAL') and not HasStatus('LOW_POLTERGEIST_INVISIBLE') and not HasStatus('POLTERGEIST_SEEINVIS_CHECK_TRUE') and not HasStatus('SPIRIT_GUARDIANS_RADIANT')

LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_See_Invis.Name: LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_See_Invisibility
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_See_Invis.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Technical: remove invisibility when player uses "see invisibility" and other relevant statuses

LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_LimitThro.Name: LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_LimitThrow
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_LimitThro.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Technical: adds nearby item aura to poltergeists

LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Fall.Name: LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Fall
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Fall.DescriptionEnglish: This creature is <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Falling damage.
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_Fall.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature est <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">immunisée</LSTag> contre les dégâts de chute.

LOW_DevilsFee_Bounty.Name: LOW_DevilsFee_Bounty
LOW_DevilsFee_Bounty.DescriptionEnglish: Tempted by the riches that Mammon offers to those most faithful to him, all allies in the presence of this creature are affected by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_DEVILSFEE_BUFF">Infectious Greed</LSTag>.
LOW_DevilsFee_Bounty.DescriptionFrench: Tentés par les richesses que Mammon offre à ceux qui lui sont fidèles, tous les alliés en présence de cette créature se retrouvent affectés par <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_DEVILSFEE_BUFF">Cupidité infectieuse</LSTag>.

LOW_DevilsFee_Gold.Name: LOW_DevilsFee_Gold
LOW_DevilsFee_Gold.DescriptionEnglish: This creature has been blessed by Mammon, giving them a second skin of gold that increases their <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> to [1] and their base <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> to [2], and grants an additional [3].
LOW_DevilsFee_Gold.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature a été bénie par Mammon, ce qui lui confère une seconde peau en or qui fait passer sa <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> à [1] et sa <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">classe d'armure</LSTag> de base à [2], tout en lui conférant un [3] supplémentaire.

LOW_DevilsFee_ImpSpell.Name: LOW_DevilsFee_ImpSpell
LOW_DevilsFee_ImpSpell.DescriptionEnglish: %%% Technical passive to apply a status that adds a spell to the Gilded Imps.
LOW_DevilsFee_ImpSpell.Conditions: not Dead() and not HasStatus('LOW_DEVILSFEE_BUFF') and not HasStatus('LOW_DEVILSFEE_SPELL')

LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon.Name: LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon
LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon.DescriptionEnglish: The affected entity draws elemental power from any myrmidons within [1].
LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon.DescriptionFrench: L'entité affectée tire de la puissance élémentaire de tous les myrmidons à moins de [1].

LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalRebuke.Name: LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalRebuke
LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalRebuke.DescriptionEnglish: When attacked, the affected entity can draw on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon">Siphoned</LSTag> magic to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LOW_RamazithsTower_Dummy">Elemental Retort</LSTag>.
LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalRebuke.DescriptionFrench: Quand on l'attaque, l'entité affectée peut utiliser la magie qu'elle a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalSiphon">ponctionnée</LSTag> pour lancer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LOW_RamazithsTower_Dummy">Réplique élémentaire</LSTag>.
LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalRebuke.Conditions: Enemy() and HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Hit) and not SpellId('Target_VowOfEnmity') and not SpellId('Target_HuntersMark') and not SpellId('Target_HuntersMark_Reapply') and HasLastAttackTriggered() and not SpellId('Target_CuttingWords')
LOW_RamazithsTower_ElementalRebuke.StatsFunctors: IF((not HasStatus('SILENCED',context.Target)) and (HasStatus('LOW_LORROAKAN_FIRE',context.Target) or HasStatus('LOW_LORROAKAN_EARTH',context.Target) or HasStatus('LOW_LORROAKAN_AIR',context.Target) or HasStatus('LOW_LORROAKAN_WATER',context.Target))):UseSpell(SWAP,Target_LOW_RamazithsTower_Dummy,true,true,true);

LOW_Chasm_Mangle_Pushback.Name: LOW_Chasm_Mangle_Pushback
LOW_Chasm_Mangle_Pushback.DescriptionEnglish: On a hit, push the target [1] away from you.
LOW_Chasm_Mangle_Pushback.DescriptionFrench: Sur un coup au but, vous repoussez la cible de [1].

LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond.Name: LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond
LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond.DescriptionEnglish: Your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> is added to the <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and damage rolls of your hunting dogs.
LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond.DescriptionFrench: Votre <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">bonus de maîtrise</LSTag> vient s'ajouter à la <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">classe d'armure</LSTag> et aux jets de dégâts de vos chiens de chasse.

LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond_Creature.Name: LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond_Creature
LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond_Creature.DescriptionEnglish: This hunting dog's <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> and damage increase by an amount equal to the <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> of its houndmaster.
LOW_Houndmaster_CompanionsBond_Creature.DescriptionFrench: La <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">classe d'armure</LSTag> de ce chien de chasse et les dégâts qu'il inflige augmentent en fonction du <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">bonus de maîtrise</LSTag> de son maître-chien.

LOW_EternalDebtors_Explosion.Name: LOW_EternalDebtors_Explosion
LOW_EternalDebtors_Explosion.DescriptionEnglish: A debt to Raphael must be paid - even in death. Upon dying, the debtor explodes in damaging flames and is reincarnated as a fiendish creature bound to Raphael.
LOW_EternalDebtors_Explosion.DescriptionFrench: Une dette due à Raphaël doit être acquittée, même par-delà la mort. En mourant, le débiteur explose dans une gerbe de flammes et se retrouve réincarné en créature infernale liée à Raphaël.

LOW_Raphael_RepelDivinity.Name: LOW_Raphael_RepelDivinity
LOW_Raphael_RepelDivinity.DescriptionEnglish: Raphael can <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_RAPHAEL_STUNNED">Stun</LSTag> a creature that hits him with Radiant damage, allowing him to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LOW_Raphael_RepelDivinity_SoulDrain">Drain</LSTag> its hit points.
LOW_Raphael_RepelDivinity.DescriptionFrench: Raphaël peut <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_RAPHAEL_STUNNED">étourdir</LSTag> une créature qui lui inflige des dégâts radiants, ce qui lui permet d'<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LOW_Raphael_RepelDivinity_SoulDrain">absorber</LSTag> les points de vie de sa victime.

LOW_Raphael_Reaper.Name: LOW_Raphael_Reaper
LOW_Raphael_Reaper.DescriptionEnglish: When Raphael reduces an enemy's hit points to [1], he <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_RAPHAEL_SOULLESS">Severs</LSTag> the soul from their body.
LOW_Raphael_Reaper.DescriptionFrench: Quand Raphaël réduit les points de vie d'un ennemi à [1], il <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_RAPHAEL_SOULLESS">dissocie</LSTag> l'âme de ce dernier de son corps.
LOW_Raphael_Reaper.Conditions: IsKillingBlow() and not HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_SOULLESS') and Enemy() and not HasStatus('SG_Polymorph')

LOW_Raphael_Cambions_ExtraDamage.Name: LOW_Raphael_Cambions_ExtraDamage
LOW_Raphael_Cambions_ExtraDamage.DescriptionEnglish: Affected entity's weapon attacks deals an additional [2] while within [1] of Raphael.
LOW_Raphael_Cambions_ExtraDamage.DescriptionFrench: Les attaques à l'arme de l'entité affectée infligent [2] supplémentaires tant qu'elle se trouve à moins de [1] de Raphaël.

LOW_Raphael_Pillar_Empowered.Name: LOW_Raphael_Pillar_Empowered
LOW_Raphael_Pillar_Empowered.DescriptionEnglish: For each remaining Soul Pillar, Raphael's attacks deal an additional [1] and he has a +[2] bonus to his Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
LOW_Raphael_Pillar_Empowered.DescriptionFrench: Pour chaque pilier d'âmes restant, les attaques de Raphaël infligent [1] supplémentaires et il bénéficie d'un bonus de +[2] à ses <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">tests</LSTag> et <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> liés à la Dextérité.

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: %%% Technical passive to set statuses to Raphael to let the player know how many souls he has.
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 1,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 2,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_2.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_2
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_2.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 2,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 3,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_3.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_3
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_3.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 3,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 4,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_4.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_4
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_4.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 4,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 5,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_5.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_5
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_5.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 5,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 6,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_6.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_6
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_6.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 6,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 7,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_7.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_7
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_7.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 7,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 8,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_8.Name: LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_8
LOW_Raphael_SoulSiphon_Passive_8.Conditions: HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 8,1, false, false, context.Source) and not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 9,1, false, false, context.Source)

LOW_Raphael_Multiattack_Passive.Name: LOW_Raphael_Multiattack_Passive
LOW_Raphael_Multiattack_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Raphael can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LOW_Raphael_Multiattack">Multiattack</LSTag> in his <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_RAPHAEL_MONSTER_FORM">Ascended Fiend</LSTag> form if all of his Soul Pillars have been destroyed and he has no Souls Charges.
LOW_Raphael_Multiattack_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Sous sa forme de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_RAPHAEL_MONSTER_FORM">fiélon ascendant</LSTag>, Raphaël est capable de porter des <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LOW_Raphael_Multiattack">attaques multiples</LSTag> si tous ses piliers d'âmes ont été détruits et qu'il n'a pas de charges spirituelles.

LOW_HouseOfHope_RaphaelsBlessing.Name: LOW_HouseOfHope_RaphaelsBlessing
LOW_HouseOfHope_RaphaelsBlessing.DescriptionEnglish: %%% Technical passive to reflect radiant damage.

LOW_Raphael_Set_Pillar_Status.Name: LOW_Raphael_Set_Pillar_Status
LOW_Raphael_Set_Pillar_Status.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Technical Passive to set pillar status at the start of the fight
LOW_Raphael_Set_Pillar_Status.Conditions: HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_PILLARCOUNTER_1') and HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_PILLARCOUNTER_2') and HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_PILLARCOUNTER_3') and HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_PILLARCOUNTER_4') and not HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_PILLAR_STATUS_VISUAL_4')

LOW_HouseOfHope_Weapon.Name: LOW_HouseOfHope_Weapon
LOW_HouseOfHope_Weapon.DescriptionEnglish: This creature's weapon will ignite at the start of its turns, dealing an additional [1].
LOW_HouseOfHope_Weapon.DescriptionFrench: L'arme de cette créature s'embrase au début de son tour, ce qui lui permet d'infliger [1] supplémentaires.

LOW_HouseOfHope_Merregon_Fire.Name: LOW_HouseOfHope_Merregon_Fire
LOW_HouseOfHope_Merregon_Fire.DescriptionEnglish: This merregon's attacks make a target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_HOUSEOFHOPE_FIRE">Flame-Feeble</LSTag>.
LOW_HouseOfHope_Merregon_Fire.DescriptionFrench: Les attaques de ce merrégon rendent la cible <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_HOUSEOFHOPE_FIRE">vulnérable aux flammes</LSTag>.

LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Imp.Name: LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Imp
LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Imp.Conditions: HasHPPercentageEqualOrLessThan(0) and not Dead() and HasStatus('LOW_HOH_DEBTOR_IMP')

LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Boar.Name: LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Boar
LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Boar.Conditions: HasHPPercentageEqualOrLessThan(0) and not Dead() and HasStatus('LOW_HOH_DEBTOR_BOAR')

LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Merregon.Name: LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Merregon
LOW_HouseOfHope_EternalDebtor_Merregon.Conditions: HasHPPercentageEqualOrLessThan(0) and not Dead() and HasStatus('LOW_HOH_DEBTOR_MERREGON')

LOW_HouseOfGrief_SharsFavour_Technical.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_SharsFavour_Technical
LOW_HouseOfGrief_SharsFavour_Technical.Conditions: (SpellId('Shout_CharmAnimalsAndPlants')) or (SpellId('Shout_PreserveLife')) or (SpellId('Shout_RadianceOfTheDawn')) or (SpellId('Shout_TurnUndead')) or (SpellId('Shout_CloakOfShadows')) or (SpellId('Shout_GuidedStrike')) or (SpellId('Shout_ReadThoughts')) or (SpellId('Shout_KnowledgeOfTheAges')) or (SpellId('Shout_KnowledgeOfTheAges_Charisma')) or (SpellId('Shout_KnowledgeOfTheAges_Intelligence')) or (SpellId('Shout_KnowledgeOfTheAges_Wisdom')) or (SpellId('Shout_KnowledgeOfTheAges_Dexterity')) or (SpellId('Shout_KnowledgeOfTheAges_Strength')) or (SpellId('Target_InvokeDuplicity'))

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Viconia_Heart_Empowered.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Viconia_Heart_Empowered
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Viconia_Heart_Empowered.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Hidden passive for Viconia to crit anyone with a heartform

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Melee.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Melee
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Melee.DescriptionEnglish: This creature deals an additional [1] when attacking from the shadows.
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Melee.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature inflige [1] supplémentaires quand elle attaque depuis une zone d'ombre.
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Melee.Conditions: not IsMiss() and not HasObscuredState(ObscuredState.Clear) and Enemy()

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Sight.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Sight
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Sight.DescriptionEnglish: This creature can see through magical and non-magical darkness, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Cultists_Sight.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature y voit dans les ténèbres magiques et non magiques, et elle ne peut pas être <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">aveuglée</LSTag>.

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Violent.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Violent
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Violent.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Passive for the cure for the Violent Heartform

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Shadowheart.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Shadowheart
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Shadowheart.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Passive for the cure for the Shadowheart Heartform

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Shadowheart_.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Shadowheart_2
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Shadowheart_.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Passive for the cure for the Shadowheart Heartform, take 2

LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Craven.Name: LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Craven
LOW_HouseOfGrief_Heart_Cure_Craven.DisplayNameEnglish: %%% Passive for the cure for the Craven Heartform

WYR_PotentDrink_Nauseous_Passive.Name: WYR_PotentDrink_Nauseous_Passive
WYR_PotentDrink_Nauseous_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(not SavingThrow(Ability.Constitution, 15, false, false, context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SWAP, STINKING_CLOUD, 100, 1)

END_ChillTouch_OnAttack.Name: END_ChillTouch_OnAttack
END_ChillTouch_OnAttack.DescriptionEnglish: Your strikes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILL_TOUCH">Bone Chill</LSTag> your target.
END_ChillTouch_OnAttack.DescriptionFrench: Vos attaques infligent <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHILL_TOUCH">Contact glacial</LSTag> à la cible.
END_ChillTouch_OnAttack.Conditions: not IsMiss() and Enemy() and IsMeleeAttack()

WYR_MerchantsHouse_ThugsNonLethal_Passiv.Name: WYR_MerchantsHouse_ThugsNonLethal_Passive
WYR_MerchantsHouse_ThugsNonLethal_Passiv.Boosts: IF(Character() and not Summon() and not IsImmuneToStatus('KNOCKED_OUT')):NonLethal()

WYR_Gortash_UnlockManifestation_Armed.Name: WYR_Gortash_UnlockManifestation_Armed
WYR_Gortash_UnlockManifestation_Armed.DescriptionEnglish: %%% Gortash unlocks armed variant of WYR_Summon_Manifestation_Gortash.

LOW_Astarion_VampireAscendant.Name: LOW_Astarion_VampireAscendant
LOW_Astarion_VampireAscendant.DescriptionEnglish:
Behold, the Vampire Ascendant! Thousands of souls have bought you power, granting you Ascendant Bite and Gaseous form.

You also have a +[1] bonus to weapon and unarmed Attack Rolls.
LOW_Astarion_VampireAscendant.DescriptionFrench:
Gloire au vampire ascendant ! Les milliers d'âmes sacrifiées vous ont permis d'acquérir un grand pouvoir, ainsi que les capacités Morsure de l'ascendant et Forme gazeuse.

Vous bénéficiez également d'un bonus de +[1] aux jets d'attaque sur vos attaques à l'arme ou à mains nues.

END_Netherbrain_LowHp.Name: END_Netherbrain_LowHp
END_Netherbrain_LowHp.Conditions: not Dead() and HasHPPercentageWithoutTemporaryHPLessThan(50) and not HasStatus('END_NETHERBRAIN_LOWHP')

ORI_Gale_ShadowSpellSlots.Name: ORI_Gale_ShadowSpellSlots
ORI_Gale_ShadowSpellSlots.DescriptionEnglish: Gale has gained a level 3 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">spell slot</LSTag>. It restores on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
ORI_Gale_ShadowSpellSlots.DescriptionFrench: Gayle a gagné un <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">emplacement de sort</LSTag> de niveau 3. Une fois qu'il l'a utilisé, il le récupère en s'octroyant un <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long repos</LSTag>.

LOW_VoloFate_SlayerKnowledge.Name: LOW_VoloFate_SlayerKnowledge
LOW_VoloFate_SlayerKnowledge.DescriptionEnglish: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Frightened by a Bhaalspawn Slayer - the tome Volo found was very informative.
LOW_VoloFate_SlayerKnowledge.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur les jets de sauvegarde quand un Rejeton de Bhaal Ravageur tente de vous <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">effrayer</LSTag>. Le livre trouvé par Volo était exhaustif sur la question.

MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Robe_Pas.Name: MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Robe_Passive
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Robe_Pas.DescriptionEnglish: When you cast a spell that deals Cold damage, gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> until the start of your next turn.
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Robe_Pas.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous lancez un sort infligeant des dégâts de froid, vous gagnez [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">points de vie temporaires</LSTag> jusqu'au début de votre prochain tour.

MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnStatusApply_Hat.Name: MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnStatusApply_Hat_Passive
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnStatusApply_Hat.DescriptionEnglish: Once per turn, any condition inflicted on a target, also applies [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Encrusted with Frost</LSTag>.
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnStatusApply_Hat.DescriptionFrench: Une fois par tour, quand le porteur inflige un état, la ou les cibles subissent également <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Gangue de givre</LSTag> pendant [1] tours.
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnStatusApply_Hat.Conditions: FrostHatRequirement() and not StatusId('MAG_FROST') and not StatusId('MAG_FROST_DURATION_TECHNICAL') and not Item() and not Self() and Enemy() and not StatusId('MONK_SOUND_SWITCH')

MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Gloves_P.Name: MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Gloves_Passive
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Gloves_P.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals cold damage, inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Encrusted with Frost</LSTag> upon the target(s).
MAG_Frost_GenerateFrostOnDamage_Gloves_P.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige des dégâts de froid, la ou les cibles subissent également <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FROST">Gangue de givre</LSTag> pendant [1] tours.

MAG_Frost_IceSurfaceProneImmunity_Boots_.Name: MAG_Frost_IceSurfaceProneImmunity_Boots_Passive
MAG_Frost_IceSurfaceProneImmunity_Boots_.DescriptionEnglish: You cannot fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> while traversing icy terrain.
MAG_Frost_IceSurfaceProneImmunity_Boots_.DescriptionFrench: Vous ne risquez pas de tomber <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">à terre</LSTag> en vous déplaçant sur les terrains gelés.

MAG_Myrkulites_CircletOfMyrkul_Circlet_P.Name: MAG_Myrkulites_CircletOfMyrkul_Circlet_Passive
MAG_Myrkulites_CircletOfMyrkul_Circlet_P.DescriptionEnglish: Allied undead within [1] are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing damage.
MAG_Myrkulites_CircletOfMyrkul_Circlet_P.DescriptionFrench: Les morts-vivants alliés à moins de [1] bénéficient d'une <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">résistance</LSTag> aux dégâts contondants, tranchants et perforants.

MAG_Frost_GenerateSurfaceOnColdDamage_Ri.Name: MAG_Frost_GenerateSurfaceOnColdDamage_Ring_Passive
MAG_Frost_GenerateSurfaceOnColdDamage_Ri.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals Cold damage, they also create a [1] circle of ice around the target(s).
MAG_Frost_GenerateSurfaceOnColdDamage_Ri.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige des dégâts de froid, il crée également un cercle de glace de [1] autour de la ou des cibles.

MAG_ElementalGish_ElementalInfusion_Ring.Name: MAG_ElementalGish_ElementalInfusion_Ring_Passive
MAG_ElementalGish_ElementalInfusion_Ring.DescriptionEnglish:
When you deal Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage using a spell or cantrip, that element infuses your weapon.

Until the end of your next turn, you deal an additional 1d4 damage of that element on your first successful weapon attack.
MAG_ElementalGish_ElementalInfusion_Ring.DescriptionFrench:
Lorsque vous infligez des dégâts d'acide, de froid, de feu, de foudre ou de tonnerre à l'aide d'un sort ou d'un sort mineur, cet élément renforce votre arme.

Jusqu'à la fin de votre prochain tour, vous causez 1d4 points de dégâts supplémentaires de même type sur votre prochaine attaque à l'arme réussie.
MAG_ElementalGish_ElementalInfusion_Ring.StatsFunctors: IF(IsSpell() and IsDamageTypeAcid()):ApplyStatus(SELF,MAG_SPELLBLADE_ACID_ENERGY, 100, 2);IF(IsSpell() and IsDamageTypeCold()):ApplyStatus(SELF,MAG_SPELLBLADE_COLD_ENERGY, 100, 2);IF(IsSpell() and IsDamageTypeFire()):ApplyStatus(SELF,MAG_SPELLBLADE_FIRE_ENERGY, 100, 2);IF(IsSpell() and IsDamageTypeLightning()):ApplyStatus(SELF,MAG_SPELLBLADE_LIGHTNING_ENERGY, 100, 2);IF(IsSpell() and IsDamageTypeThunder()):ApplyStatus(SELF,MAG_SPELLBLADE_THUNDER_ENERGY, 100, 2);

MAG_ElementalGish_MomentumOnElementalDam.Name: MAG_ElementalGish_MomentumOnElementalDamage_Boots_Passive
MAG_ElementalGish_MomentumOnElementalDam.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever the wearer deals Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Thunder damage with a spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag>, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Momentum</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_ElementalGish_MomentumOnElementalDam.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que le porteur inflige des dégâts d'acide, de froid, de feu, de foudre ou de tonnerre à l'aide d'un sort ou d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">sort mineur</LSTag>, il bénéficie de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_MOMENTUM">Vélocité</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.

MAG_ElementalGish_ArcaneAcuity_Helmet_Pa.Name: MAG_ElementalGish_ArcaneAcuity_Helmet_Passive
MAG_ElementalGish_ArcaneAcuity_Helmet_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you deal damage with a weapon attack, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_ElementalGish_ArcaneAcuity_Helmet_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous infligez des dégâts à l'aide d'une attaque à l'arme, vous gagnez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Acuité arcanique</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.

MAG_ElementalGish_BaneOnElementalWeaponD.Name: MAG_ElementalGish_BaneOnElementalWeaponDamage_Gloves_Passive
MAG_ElementalGish_BaneOnElementalWeaponD.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you deal damage with a weapon attack, the target receives a -[1] penalty to its <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against your next spell.
MAG_ElementalGish_BaneOnElementalWeaponD.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous infligez des dégâts à l'aide d'une attaque à l'arme, la cible subit un malus de -[1] à son <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> contre votre prochain sort.

MAG_ElementalGish_CantripBooster_Amulet_.Name: MAG_ElementalGish_CantripBooster_Amulet_Passive
MAG_ElementalGish_CantripBooster_Amulet_.DescriptionEnglish: When one of your <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrips</LSTag> deals Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage, add your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Modifier</LSTag> to the damage dealt.
MAG_ElementalGish_CantripBooster_Amulet_.DescriptionFrench: Quand l'un de vos <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">sorts mineurs</LSTag> inflige des dégâts d'acide, de froid, de feu, de foudre ou de tonnerre, vous ajoutez votre <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">modificateur d'incantation</LSTag> aux dégâts que vous infligez.
MAG_ElementalGish_CantripBooster_Amulet_.Boosts: IF(IsCantrip() and (SpellDamageTypeIs(DamageType.Fire) or SpellDamageTypeIs(DamageType.Cold) or SpellDamageTypeIs(DamageType.Thunder) or SpellDamageTypeIs(DamageType.Acid) or SpellDamageTypeIs(DamageType.Lightning))):DamageBonus(max(1,SpellCastingAbilityModifier))

Absorb_Elements_Passive.Name: Absorb_Elements_Passive
Absorb_Elements_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Absorb elemental damage once per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>. Take half damage from the next elemental attack targetting you, and deal an additional [1] of that element type on your next attack.
Absorb_Elements_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Permet d'absorber des dégâts élémentaires, une fois entre deux <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">courts repos</LSTag>. Vous subissez des dégâts réduits de moitié la prochaine fois qu'une attaque élémentaire vous prend pour cible, et vous ajoutez [1] supplémentaires de ce même type de dégâts élémentaire sur votre prochaine attaque.

Absorb_Elements_Technical_Passive.Name: Absorb_Elements_Technical_Passive
Absorb_Elements_Technical_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(IsDamageTypeAcid()):ApplyStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_ACID_DAMAGE, 100, 2);IF(IsDamageTypeCold()):ApplyStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_COLD_DAMAGE, 100, 2);IF(IsDamageTypeFire()):ApplyStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_FIRE_DAMAGE, 100, 2);IF(IsDamageTypeLightning()):ApplyStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_LIGHTNING_DAMAGE, 100, 2);IF(IsDamageTypeThunder()):ApplyStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_THUNDER_DAMAGE, 100, 2);IF(IsDamageTypeAcid() or IsDamageTypeCold() or IsDamageTypeFire() or IsDamageTypeLightning() or IsDamageTypeThunder()):ApplyStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_COOLDOWN_TECHNICAL, 100, -1);IF(IsDamageTypeAcid() or IsDamageTypeCold() or IsDamageTypeFire() or IsDamageTypeLightning() or IsDamageTypeThunder()):RemoveStatus(ABSORB_ELEMENTS_ACTIVE)

CRE_LathandersBlessing_Passive.Name: CRE_LathandersBlessing_Passive
CRE_LathandersBlessing_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Once per <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>, when your hit points are reduced to 0, you regain [2]. Allies within [1] also regain [3].
CRE_LathandersBlessing_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une fois avant votre prochain <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long repos</LSTag>, quand vos points de vie tombent à 0, vous récupérez [2]. Tous vos alliés à moins de [1] récupèrent également [3].

CRE_LathandersBlessing_Cooldown_Passive.Name: CRE_LathandersBlessing_Cooldown_Passive
CRE_LathandersBlessing_Cooldown_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(context.HasContextFlag(StatsFunctorContext.OnLongRest)):ApplyStatus(MAG_LATHANDERS_BLESSING_RESURRECT_RESOURCE, 100, -1);IF(context.HasContextFlag(StatsFunctorContext.OnCreate) and HasStatus('MAG_LATHANDERS_TRACKER', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Target)) and not HasStatus('MAG_LATHANDERS_BLESSING_RESURRECT_RESOURCE_DEPLETED', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Target))):ApplyStatus(MAG_LATHANDERS_BLESSING_RESURRECT_RESOURCE, 100, -1);IF(context.HasContextFlag(StatsFunctorContext.OnCreate) and HasStatus('MAG_LATHANDERS_TRACKER', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Target)) and not HasStatus('MAG_LATHANDERS_BLESSING_RESURRECT_RESOURCE_DEPLETED', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Target))):ApplyStatus(MAG_LATHANDERS_BLESSING_RESURRECT_RESOURCE, 100, -1)

CRE_LathandersLight_Passive.Name: CRE_LathandersLight_Passive
CRE_LathandersLight_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Sheds holy light in a [1] radius. In combat, fiends and undead standing in the light are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, unless they succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
CRE_LathandersLight_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Diffuse une lumière sacrée dans un rayon de [1]. En situation de combat, fiélons et morts-vivants pris dans cette lumière se retrouvent <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">aveuglés</LSTag>, à moins de réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Constitution.

ShadowBlade_Passive.Name: ShadowBlade_Passive
ShadowBlade_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets when using this blade.
ShadowBlade_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand vous utilisez cette lame, vous bénéficiez d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur vos <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> contre les cibles qui se trouvent dans une zone à visibilité réduite ou nulle.

MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Circlet_Passive.Name: MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Circlet_Passive
MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Circlet_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you inflict a condition, gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_SYNERGY">Arcane Synergy</LSTag> for 2 rounds.
MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Circlet_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Lorsque vous causez un état, vous gagnez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_SYNERGY">Synergie arcanique</LSTag> pendant 2 rounds.
MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Circlet_Passive.Conditions: not StatusId('MAG_GISH_ARCANE_SYNERGY') and not StatusId('SNEAKING') and not StatusId('SNEAKING_CLEAR') and not StatusId('SNEAKING_LIGHTLY_OBSCURED') and not StatusId('SNEAKING_HEAVILY_OBSCURED') and not StatusId('DISENGAGE') and not StatusId('NON_LETHAL') and not StatusId('DASH') and not StatusId('MONK_SOUND_SWITCH')

MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Ring_Passive.Name: MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Ring_Passive
MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Ring_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you deal damage with a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">cantrip</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_SYNERGY">Arcane Synergy</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_Gish_ArcaneSynergy_Ring_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand vous infligez des dégâts à l'aide d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">sort mineur</LSTag>, vous gagnez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_SYNERGY">Synergie arcanique</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.

MAG_Gish_ArcaneAcuity_Gloves_Passive.Name: MAG_Gish_ArcaneAcuity_Gloves_Passive
MAG_Gish_ArcaneAcuity_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When a weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack roll</LSTag> inflicts a condition, the wielder gains <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag>.
MAG_Gish_ArcaneAcuity_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand un de ses <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> à l'arme inflige un état, le porteur gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Acuité arcanique</LSTag>.

MAG_Gish_PsychicDamageBonusWhileConcentr.Name: MAG_Gish_PsychicDamageBonusWhileConcentrating_Ring_Passive
MAG_Gish_PsychicDamageBonusWhileConcentr.DescriptionEnglish: While <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentrating</LSTag> on a spell, the wearer's weapon attacks deal an additional [1].
MAG_Gish_PsychicDamageBonusWhileConcentr.DescriptionFrench: Tant que le porteur se <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentre</LSTag> sur un sort, ses attaques à l'arme infligent [1] supplémentaires.

MAG_Gish_TempHPWhileConcentrating_Boots_.Name: MAG_Gish_TempHPWhileConcentrating_Boots_Passive
MAG_Gish_TempHPWhileConcentrating_Boots_.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer casts a spell that requires <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>, they gain [1].
MAG_Gish_TempHPWhileConcentrating_Boots_.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur lance un sort nécessitant toute sa <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">concentration</LSTag>, il gagne [1].

MAG_Radiant_DamageBonusOnIlluminatedTarg.Name: MAG_Radiant_DamageBonusOnIlluminatedTarget_Ring_Passive
MAG_Radiant_DamageBonusOnIlluminatedTarg.DescriptionEnglish: The wearer deals an additional [1] points of damage against creatures that are illuminated.
MAG_Radiant_DamageBonusOnIlluminatedTarg.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur inflige [1] points de dégâts supplémentaires contre les créatures éclairées.

MAG_Radiant_Radiating_Helmet_Passive.Name: MAG_Radiant_Radiating_Helmet_Passive
MAG_Radiant_Radiating_Helmet_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Creatures who miss their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the wearer must make a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or take [1].
MAG_Radiant_Radiating_Helmet_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Les créatures ratant leur <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jet d'attaque</LSTag> contre le porteur doivent réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité sous peine de subir [1].

MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Armor_Passive.Name: MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Armor_Passive
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Armor_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals Radiant damage, they cause a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Explosion">Radiant Shockwave</LSTag>.
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Armor_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur cause des dégâts radiants, il inflige également <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Explosion">Onde de choc radiante</LSTag>.

MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Ring_Passive.Name: MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Ring_Passive
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Ring_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals spell damage while illuminated by a light source, they also inflict <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> upon the target for [1] turns.
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Ring_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur cause des dégâts de sort alors qu'il est éclairé par une source de lumière, il inflige également <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Orbe rayonnant</LSTag> à la cible pendant [1] tours.

MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Gloves_Passive.Name: MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Gloves_Passive
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals [1], the target receives 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag>.
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige [1], la cible subit 1 tour d'<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Orbe rayonnant</LSTag>.

MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_OnDamage_Passiv.Name: MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_OnDamage_Passive
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_OnDamage_Passiv.DescriptionEnglish: On a hit, inflict [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiating Orb</LSTag> upon the target.
MAG_Radiant_RadiatingOrb_OnDamage_Passiv.DescriptionFrench: Sur un coup au but, vous infligez [1] tour d'<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Orbe rayonnant</LSTag> à la cible.

MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_Halberd_Passive.Name: MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_Halberd_Passive
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_Halberd_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wielder deals melee damage with this weapon, they gain [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>.
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_Halberd_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige des dégâts au corps à corps avec cette arme, il gagne [1] tours de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Conduit de la force</LSTag>.

MAG_ZOC_RampartAura_Amulet_Passive.Name: MAG_ZOC_RampartAura_Amulet_Passive
MAG_ZOC_RampartAura_Amulet_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Costs <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag> to remain active. All entities with or in this aura have their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> halved.
MAG_ZOC_RampartAura_Amulet_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Coûte <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Conduit de la force</LSTag> pour rester active. Toutes les entités bénéficiant de cette aura ou se trouvant à l'intérieur voient leur <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">vitesse de déplacement</LSTag> réduite de moitié.
MAG_ZOC_RampartAura_Amulet_Passive.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: You must toggle this on in order to activate this condition.
MAG_ZOC_RampartAura_Amulet_Passive.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Vous devez activer cette aura pour bénéficier de cet état.

MAG_ZOC_ForceConduitWhileSurounded_Boots.Name: MAG_ZOC_ForceConduitWhileSurounded_Boots_Passive
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduitWhileSurounded_Boots.DescriptionEnglish: At the end of your turn, generate <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag> while surrounded by [1] or more enemies.
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduitWhileSurounded_Boots.DescriptionFrench: À la fin de votre tour, vous générez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Conduit de la force</LSTag> si vous êtes entouré de [1] ennemis ou plus

MAG_ZOC_AdvantageOnMeleeAttackWhileSurou.Name: MAG_ZOC_AdvantageOnMeleeAttackWhileSurounded_Gloves_Passive
MAG_ZOC_AdvantageOnMeleeAttackWhileSurou.DescriptionEnglish: The wearer gains <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">melee attack rolls</LSTag> while surrounded by [1] or more foes.
MAG_ZOC_AdvantageOnMeleeAttackWhileSurou.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur bénéficie d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> tant qu'il est encerclé par au moins [1] adversaires.
MAG_ZOC_AdvantageOnMeleeAttackWhileSurou.Boosts: IF(IsMeleeAttack() and IsWeaponAttack() and HasEnemyWithinRange('SG_Incapacitated', 3, nil, 2, context.Target, context.Source)):Advantage(AttackRoll);

MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_HeavyArmor_Passive.Name: MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_HeavyArmor_Passive
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_HeavyArmor_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag> when taking Slashing, Piercing, or Bludgeoning damage.
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_HeavyArmor_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Gagne <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Conduit de la force</LSTag> en subissant des dégâts tranchants, perforants ou contondants.

MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_EnergyConversionBla.Name: MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_EnergyConversionBlast_Passive
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_EnergyConversionBla.DescriptionEnglish: Deal [1] in a [2] radius when you take damage while having 5 or more charges.
MAG_ZOC_ForceConduit_EnergyConversionBla.DescriptionFrench: Vous infligez [1] dans un rayon de [2] quand vous subissez des dégâts alors que vous avez au moins 5 charges.

MAG_Fire_HeatOnFireDamage_Gloves_Passive.Name: MAG_Fire_HeatOnFireDamage_Gloves_Passive
MAG_Fire_HeatOnFireDamage_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you deal Fire damage, you gain 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_HeatOnFireDamage_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous infligez des dégâts de feu, vous gagnez 2 tours de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Chaleur</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_HeatOnFireDamage_Gloves_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(not HasStatus('MAG_FIRE_HEAT_ONCE_TECHNICAL', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT_CHARGE_UP_TECHNICAL,100, 0);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT, 100, 2);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT_ONCE_TECHNICAL, 100, 0);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT_DURATION_TECHNICAL, 100, 1)

MAG_Fire_HeatOnTakingFireDamage_Amulet_P.Name: MAG_Fire_HeatOnTakingFireDamage_Amulet_Passive
MAG_Fire_HeatOnTakingFireDamage_Amulet_P.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you take Fire damage dealt by another creature, you gain 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_HeatOnTakingFireDamage_Amulet_P.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois qu'une autre créature vous inflige des dégâts de feu, vous gagnez 2 tours de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Chaleur</LSTag>.

MAG_Fire_ArcaneAcuityOnFireDamage_Hat_Pa.Name: MAG_Fire_ArcaneAcuityOnFireDamage_Hat_Passive
MAG_Fire_ArcaneAcuityOnFireDamage_Hat_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you deal Fire damage, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag> for 2 turns.
MAG_Fire_ArcaneAcuityOnFireDamage_Hat_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous infligez des dégâts de feu, vous gagnez <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Acuité arcanique</LSTag> pendant 2 tours.

MAG_Fire_HeatOnInflictBurning_Boots_Pass.Name: MAG_Fire_HeatOnInflictBurning_Boots_Passive
MAG_Fire_HeatOnInflictBurning_Boots_Pass.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> an enemy, you gain 2 turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_HeatOnInflictBurning_Boots_Pass.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">brûlez</LSTag> un ennemi, vous gagnez 2 tours de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Chaleur</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_HeatOnInflictBurning_Boots_Pass.StatsFunctors: IF(not Self() and StatusId('BURNING')):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT, 100, 2);IF(not HasStatus('MAG_FIRE_HEAT_ONCE_TECHNICAL', context.Source) and not Self() and StatusId('BURNING')):ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT_CHARGE_UP_TECHNICAL, 100, 2);ApplyStatus(SELF,MAG_FIRE_HEAT_ONCE_TECHNICAL, 100, 0);ApplyStatus(SELF, MAG_FIRE_HEAT_DURATION_TECHNICAL, 100, 1)

MAG_Fire_BurningOnDamaged_Cloak_Passive.Name: MAG_Fire_BurningOnDamaged_Cloak_Passive
MAG_Fire_BurningOnDamaged_Cloak_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: A creature that damages the wearer within [1] receives <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_BurningOnDamaged_Cloak_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Une créature à moins de [1] infligeant des dégâts au porteur subit l'effet <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Brûlure</LSTag>.
MAG_Fire_BurningOnDamaged_Cloak_Passive.StatsFunctors: IF(not SavingThrow(Ability.Dexterity, 12, false, false, context.Source) and not HasStatus('BURNING', context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SWAP, BURNING, 100, 2)

MAG_Fire_Heat_Convergence_Passive.Name: MAG_Fire_Heat_Convergence_Passive
MAG_Fire_Heat_Convergence_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Consume your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Heat</LSTag> to fuel a powerful attack.
MAG_Fire_Heat_Convergence_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Consommez votre <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_FIRE_HEAT">Chaleur</LSTag> pour pouvoir porter une puissante attaque.
MAG_Fire_Heat_Convergence_Passive.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: The next time you deal Fire damage, you deal an additional [1] for every turn of Heat remaining.
MAG_Fire_Heat_Convergence_Passive.ExtraDescriptionFrench: La prochaine fois que vous causez des dégâts de feu, vous infligez [1] supplémentaires pour chaque tour de Chaleur restant.

MAG_Heat_Fire_Robe_Passive.Name: MAG_Heat_Fire_Robe_Passive
MAG_Heat_Fire_Robe_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: On a successful <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against a foe's spell, deal [1] to them.
MAG_Heat_Fire_Robe_Passive.DescriptionFrench: En cas de <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> réussi contre un sort d'un adversaire, vous infligez [1] à ce dernier.
MAG_Heat_Fire_Robe_Passive.Conditions: IsSpell() and IsLastConditionRollSuccess(ConditionRollType.ConditionSavingThrow) and not Self() and IsSavingThrow()

MAG_Thunder_Reverberation.Name: MAG_Thunder_Reverberation
MAG_Thunder_Reverberation.StatsFunctors: IF(ReverberationBlastRequirement(context.Target) and not HasStatus('MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION_ONCE_TECHNICAL')):DealDamage(1d4, Thunder,Magical);IF(ReverberationBlastRequirement(context.Target) and not HasStatus('MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION_ONCE_TECHNICAL') and not SavingThrow(Ability.Constitution, 10)):ApplyStatus(PRONE,100,2);IF(ReverberationBlastRequirement(context.Target)):ApplyStatus(MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION_ONCE_TECHNICAL, 100, 0);IF(ReverberationBlastRequirement(context.Target)):RemoveStatus(MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION)

MAG_Thunder_Reverberation_Gloves_Passive.Name: MAG_Thunder_Reverberation_Gloves_Passive
MAG_Thunder_Reverberation_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals [1], [2], or [3], inflict [4] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag> upon the target(s).
MAG_Thunder_Reverberation_Gloves_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige [1], [2] ou [3], il impose aussi [4] tours de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Réverbération</LSTag> à la ou aux cible(s).

MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnStatusApply_B.Name: MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnStatusApply_Boots_Passive
MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnStatusApply_B.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer inflicts a condition upon a hostile creature, they also inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag>.
MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnStatusApply_B.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige un état à une créature hostile, il lui impose également [1] tours de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Réverbération</LSTag>.
MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnStatusApply_B.Conditions: Enemy() and not Self() and not StatusId('MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION') and not StatusId('MONK_SOUND_SWITCH')

MAG_Thunder_ArcaneAcuityOnThunderDamage_.Name: MAG_Thunder_ArcaneAcuityOnThunderDamage_Hat_Passive
MAG_Thunder_ArcaneAcuityOnThunderDamage_.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals [1], they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Arcane Acuity</LSTag>.
MAG_Thunder_ArcaneAcuityOnThunderDamage_.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur inflige [1], il bénéficie d'<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_GISH_ARCANE_ACUITY">Acuité arcanique</LSTag>.

MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnRangeSpellDam.Name: MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnRangeSpellDamage_Amulet_Passive
MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnRangeSpellDam.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals damage with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedSpellAttack">Ranged Spell Attack</LSTag>, inflict [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag> upon the target(s).
MAG_Thunder_ReverberationOnRangeSpellDam.DescriptionFrench: Quand le porteur cause des dégâts à l'aide d'une <LSTag Tooltip="RangedSpellAttack">attaque de sort à distance</LSTag>, il inflige aussi [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Réverbération</LSTag> à la ou aux cibles.

MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnReverberatedCre.Name: MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnReverberatedCreature_Cloak_Passive
MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnReverberatedCre.DescriptionEnglish: When a creature with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberation</LSTag> deals damage to the wearer, the creature needs to make a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazed</LSTag>.
MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnReverberatedCre.DescriptionFrench: Quand une créature affectée par <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Réverbération</LSTag> inflige des dégâts au porteur, elle doit réussir un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Constitution sous peine de se retrouver <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">hébétée</LSTag>.
MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnReverberatedCre.Conditions: HasStatus('MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION', context.Source) and not HasStatus('DAZED', context.Source)

MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnThunderDamage_R.Name: MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnThunderDamage_Ring_Passive
MAG_Thunder_InflictDazeOnThunderDamage_R.DescriptionEnglish: When the wearer deals Thunder damage to a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_THUNDER_REVERBERATION">Reverberating</LSTag> creature, it becomes <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazed</LSTag> unless it succeeds a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
