Il permet au porteur de lancer <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WardingBond">Lien de protection</LSTag> une fois entre deux <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">longs repos</LSTag> sur la créature portant l'autre anneau au doigt.

TWN_BondedByLove_WifesRing_Passive.Name: TWN_BondedByLove_WifesRing_Passive
TWN_BondedByLove_WifesRing_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: One of a magical pair of rings, this allows the wearer to receive <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WardingBond">Warding Bond</LSTag> from a creature wearing the matching ring.
TWN_BondedByLove_WifesRing_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Cet anneau fait partie d'une paire d'alliances. Il permet au porteur de recevoir <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WardingBond">Lien de protection</LSTag>, lancé par la créature portant l'autre anneau au doigt.

MAG_ProficientSupport_Weapon_Passive.Name: MAG_ProficientSupport_Weapon_Passive
MAG_ProficientSupport_Weapon_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You are considered <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">proficient</LSTag> with this weapon.
MAG_ProficientSupport_Weapon_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous <LSTag Tooltip="WeaponProficiency">maîtrisez</LSTag> le maniement de cette arme.

MAG_ShadowBlinding_Weapon_Passive.Name: MAG_ShadowBlinding_Weapon_Passive
MAG_ShadowBlinding_Weapon_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>, you have a chance of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> your target.
MAG_ShadowBlinding_Weapon_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si vous attaquez en bénéficiant d'un <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">avantage</LSTag>, vous avez une chance d'<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">aveugler</LSTag> la cible.

MAG_Viconia_Robe_Resistance_Passive.Name: MAG_Viconia_Robe_Resistance_Passive
MAG_Viconia_Robe_Resistance_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIELD_OF_FAITH">Shield of Faith</LSTag> also grants you a +[1] bonus to all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
MAG_Viconia_Robe_Resistance_Passive.DescriptionFrench: <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIELD_OF_FAITH">Bouclier de la foi</LSTag> vous confère également un bonus de +[1] à tous les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>.

MAG_AbsoluteProtector_Shield_Passive.Name: MAG_AbsoluteProtector_Shield_Passive
MAG_AbsoluteProtector_Shield_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: If the wielder bears the Absolute's Brand, all damage received from spells is reduced by [1].
MAG_AbsoluteProtector_Shield_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Si le porteur a la marque de l'Absolue, tous les dégâts que lui infligent les sorts sont réduits de [1].

MAG_OuterEntitySlayer_Passive.Name: MAG_OuterEntitySlayer_Passive
MAG_OuterEntitySlayer_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When wielded against fey, fiends, or undead foes, this weapon has a +[1] bonus to Damage and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
MAG_OuterEntitySlayer_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand on la manie contre les créatures féériques, les fiélons ou les morts-vivants, cette arme bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et aux dégâts.

MAG_PlaneShifterSlayer_Passive.Name: MAG_PlaneShifterSlayer_Passive
MAG_PlaneShifterSlayer_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: This weapon grants a +[1] bonus to Damage and <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against githyanki, aberrations, fiends, and elementals.
MAG_PlaneShifterSlayer_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Cette arme confère un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et aux dégâts contre les githyankis, les aberrations, les fiélons et les élémentaires.

MAG_FireThrow_Passive.Name: MAG_FireThrow_Passive
MAG_FireThrow_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When launched at a target, deal an additional [1].
MAG_FireThrow_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Inflige [1] supplémentaires quand on le lance sur une cible.

MAG_HomingWeapon_Passive.Name: MAG_HomingWeapon_Passive
MAG_HomingWeapon_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: This weapon will return to its owner when thrown.
MAG_HomingWeapon_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Cette arme revient dans la main de son porteur après avoir été lancée.

MAG_MeleeCaster_Passive.Name: MAG_MeleeCaster_Passive
MAG_MeleeCaster_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: Instead of its Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, the affected entity add its <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
MAG_MeleeCaster_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Au lieu de son <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">modificateur</LSTag> de Dextérité, l'entité affectée ajoute son <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">modificateur de caractéristique d'incantation</LSTag> à ses <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag>.

MAG_InfernalWeapon_WeaponBoost_Passive.Name: MAG_InfernalWeapon_WeaponBoost_Passive
MAG_InfernalWeapon_WeaponBoost_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: On a hit, the affected entity deals an additional [1] and can possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> its target.
MAG_InfernalWeapon_WeaponBoost_Passive.DescriptionFrench: En cas de coup au but, l'entité affectée inflige [1] supplémentaires et a une chance d'<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">empoisonner</LSTag> sa cible.

MAG_MonkAmulet_WisdomDebuff_Passive.Name: MAG_MonkAmulet_WisdomDebuff_Passive
MAG_MonkAmulet_WisdomDebuff_Passive.DescriptionFrench: L'entité affectée subit un malus de -[1] en Sagesse.

MAG_ImpalerTempHP_Passive.Name: MAG_ImpalerTempHP_Passive
MAG_ImpalerTempHP_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When you reduce a target to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, you gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
MAG_ImpalerTempHP_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand vous réduisez une cible à 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">point de vie</LSTag>, vous gagnez [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">points de vie temporaires</LSTag>.

MAG_UnarmedEnchantment_1_Passive.Name: MAG_UnarmedEnchantment_1_Passive
MAG_UnarmedEnchantment_1_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You gain a +[1] bonus to Unarmed <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage.
MAG_UnarmedEnchantment_1_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'un bonus de +[1] aux <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> et de dégâts des attaques à mains nues.

MAG_ShieldOfDevotion_Passive.Name: MAG_ShieldOfDevotion_Passive
MAG_ShieldOfDevotion_Passive.Conditions: (not HasActionResource('SpellSlot', 100, 1, true) and IsSpellLevel(1))  or (SpellId('Target_Smite_Divine') and (HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Hit) or HasDamageEffectFlag(DamageFlags.Critical)))

MAG_WYRM_Farlin_Dagger_Passive.Name: MAG_WYRM_Farlin_Dagger_Passive
MAG_WYRM_Farlin_Dagger_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: When this dagger is wielded in the off-hand, the wielder gains a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
MAG_WYRM_Farlin_Dagger_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Quand cette dague est maniée dans la main secondaire, son porteur bénéficie d'un bonus de +[1] à la <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">classe d'armure</LSTag>.

MAG_Umberlee_FireColdResistance_Passive.Name: MAG_Umberlee_FireColdResistance_Passive
MAG_Umberlee_FireColdResistance_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: You have resistance to Fire and Cold Damage.
MAG_Umberlee_FireColdResistance_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'une résistance aux dégâts de feu et de froid.

MAG_Longstrider_Passive.Name: MAG_Longstrider_Passive
MAG_Longstrider_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez de <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LONGSTRIDER">Grande foulée</LSTag>.

MAG_Watcher_Helmet_Darkvision_Passive.Name: MAG_Watcher_Helmet_Darkvision_Passive
MAG_Watcher_Helmet_Darkvision_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: The wearer can see in the dark up to [1] and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
MAG_Watcher_Helmet_Darkvision_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Le porteur y voit dans le noir jusqu'à une distance de [1]. De plus, il ne peut pas être <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">aveuglé</LSTag>.

MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodseeker_Pa.Name: MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodseeker_Passive
MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodseeker_Pa.DisplayNameFrench: Attiré par le goût du sang
MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodseeker_Pa.DescriptionEnglish: You gain a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> when attacking creatures that have already taken damage.
MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodseeker_Pa.DescriptionFrench: Vous bénéficiez d'un bonus de +[1] sur vos <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">jets d'attaque</LSTag> quand vous vous en prenez à des créatures ayant déjà subi des dégâts.

MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodthirsty_P.Name: MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodthirsty_Passive
MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodthirsty_P.DescriptionEnglish: Unarmed and melee attacks will deal an extra [1] as long as you don't have your full health. If you don't deal any damage this turn, you take [2] at the end of your turn.
MAG_Barbarian_Hide_Helmet_Bloodthirsty_P.DescriptionFrench: Vos attaques au corps à corps et vos attaques à mains nues infligent [1] supplémentaires tant qu'il vous manque des points de vie. Si vous n'infligez pas de dégâts de tout le tour, subissez [2] à la fin de votre tour.

MAG_Light_Base_Passive.Name: MAG_Light_Base_Passive
MAG_Light_Base_Passive.DescriptionEnglish: This object shines with a glowing light in a radius of [1].
MAG_Light_Base_Passive.DescriptionFrench: Cet objet diffuse une lumière brillante dans un rayon de [1].
MAG_Light_Base_Passive.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: Toggle this to douse and rekindle the light.
MAG_Light_Base_Passive.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Utilisez ceci pour éteindre ou rallumer la lumière.

MAG_Light_FarlinDagger_Passive.Name: MAG_Light_FarlinDagger_Passive
MAG_Light_FarlinDagger_Passive.ToggleOffFunctors: IF(HasStatus('MAG_LIGHT_DIVINE', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Source)) and HasStatus('MAG_FARLIN_DAGGER_LIGHT_TECHNICAL', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MeleeMainHand, MAG_MAGIC_ITEM_LIGHT_REMOVER, 100, 0);IF(HasStatus('MAG_LIGHT_DIVINE', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Source)) and HasStatus('MAG_FARLIN_DAGGER_LIGHT_TECHNICAL', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MeleeOffHand, MAG_MAGIC_ITEM_LIGHT_REMOVER, 100, 0)

MAG_Light_TheThorns_Passive.Name: MAG_Light_TheThorns_Passive
MAG_Light_TheThorns_Passive.ToggleOffFunctors: IF(HasStatus('MAG_LIGHT_DIVINE', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Source)) and HasStatus('MAG_THE_THORNS_LIGHT_TECHNICAL', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MeleeMainHand, MAG_MAGIC_ITEM_LIGHT_REMOVER, 100, 0);IF(HasStatus('MAG_LIGHT_DIVINE', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Source)) and HasStatus('MAG_THE_THORNS_LIGHT_TECHNICAL', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MeleeOffHand, MAG_MAGIC_ITEM_LIGHT_REMOVER, 100, 0)

MAG_Light_MoonlightGlaive_Passive.Name: MAG_Light_MoonlightGlaive_Passive
MAG_Light_MoonlightGlaive_Passive.DisplayNameFrench: Coutille du clair de lune : brille
MAG_Light_MoonlightGlaive_Passive.ToggleOffFunctors: IF(HasStatus('MAG_LIGHT_DIVINE', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Source)) and HasStatus('MAG_MOONLIGHT_GLAIVE_LIGHT_TECHNICAL', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeMainHand, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MeleeMainHand, MAG_MAGIC_ITEM_LIGHT_REMOVER, 100, 0);IF(HasStatus('MAG_LIGHT_DIVINE', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Source)) and HasStatus('MAG_MOONLIGHT_GLAIVE_LIGHT_TECHNICAL', GetItemInEquipmentSlot(EquipmentSlot.MeleeOffHand, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(MeleeOffHand, MAG_MAGIC_ITEM_LIGHT_REMOVER, 100, 0)

Multiattack_Ettercap_Hardcore.Name: Multiattack_Ettercap_Hardcore
Multiattack_Ettercap_Hardcore.DescriptionEnglish: The ettercap can make a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Ettercap">Multiattack</LSTag> if the target is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEB">Enwebbed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.
Multiattack_Ettercap_Hardcore.DescriptionFrench: L'ettercap peut porter des <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Multiattack_Ettercap">attaques multiples</LSTag> si sa cible est <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WEB">entoilée</LSTag> ou <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">empoisonnée</LSTag>.

LOW_Cistern_Evasion.Name: LOW_Cistern_Evasion
LOW_Cistern_Evasion.DescriptionEnglish: Whenever you fail a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against an attack from a non-hostile creature, you may succeed instead.
LOW_Cistern_Evasion.DescriptionFrench: Chaque fois que vous ratez un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> lié à une attaque portée par une créature non hostile, vous pouvez choisir de le réussir automatiquement.
LOW_Cistern_Evasion.ExtraDescriptionEnglish: If any damage is inflicted from succeeding a Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, the damage is nullified.
LOW_Cistern_Evasion.ExtraDescriptionFrench: Si vous devriez subir des dégâts après avoir réussi un <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jet de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité, ils sont purement et simplement annulés.

LOW_Raphael_ArchfiendWill.Name: LOW_Raphael_ArchfiendWill
LOW_Raphael_ArchfiendWill.DescriptionEnglish: Effects that control or incapacitate creatures only last [1] turn against this being of pure infernal ambition.
LOW_Raphael_ArchfiendWill.DescriptionFrench: L'ambition infernale de cet être est telle que les effets contrôlant les créatures ou les mettant hors de combat ne durent que [1] tour contre lui.
LOW_Raphael_ArchfiendWill.Conditions: (HasStatus('PLANAR_BINDING') or HasStatus('HOLD_MONSTER') or HasStatus('TURN_THE_UNHOLY') or HasStatus('TURNED') or HasStatus('SG_Dominated')) and (not HasStatus('LOW_RAPHAEL_WILLPOWER'))

LOW_AncientLair_Curse_Hardcore.Name: LOW_AncientLair_Curse_Hardcore
LOW_AncientLair_Curse_Hardcore.DescriptionEnglish: Cursed by the rot of an undead's lair. After casting a spell, you receive [1] per Spell Level. In addition, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Once the curse is removed, a character cannot be cursed this way again until they finish a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
LOW_AncientLair_Curse_Hardcore.DescriptionFrench: Maudit par la putréfaction régnant dans l'antre d'un mort-vivant. Après avoir lancé un sort, vous subissez [1] par niveau du sort, ainsi qu'un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur tous les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag>. Une fois la malédiction levée, un personnage ne peut plus être maudit de la sorte avant la fin de son prochain <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long repos</LSTag>.

LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_DexDisadv.Name: LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_DexDisadvantage
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_DexDisadv.DescriptionEnglish: This creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_POLTERGEIST_INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
LOW_OskarsBeloved_Poltergeists_DexDisadv.DescriptionFrench: Cette créature subit un <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">désavantage</LSTag> sur les <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">jets de sauvegarde</LSTag> de Dextérité tant qu'elle est <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOW_POLTERGEIST_INVISIBLE">invisible</LSTag>.
